Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N01
Reply.text: Koko wa totemo kikendesu. Saa, koko kara tsuredashimasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N02
Reply.text: Anatahadaredesu ka? Kuso, kono sanzoku wa nan-ri iru nda! Soshite, sorera wa masumasu fuete imasu!

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N03
Reply.text: Jikan wa matte kuremasen! Watashitachi to isshodesu ka?

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N04b
Reply.text: Hai! Watashi wa hitori de shinu koto ni naru…

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N04a
Reply.text: Ore wa dokoni mo ikanee! Karera wa satsujin-shada! Watashitachiha issho ni karera to tatakawanakereba narimasen!

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N05a
Reply.text: Hitoride wa naku, watashitachi no tasuke ga nakereba, karera o taosu koto wa dekimasen. Ikitainara foroo shite kudasai.

Reply.name: r4m2_MilitaryBase_Man1_1_N06a
Reply.text: Watashi wa modotte kimasu!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N01
Reply.text: Watashi no nakama-tachi wa, moosukoshi de jikandoorini toochaku shimashita - soo sureba, anata-tachi ni nokosa reru no wa hai dake ni narudeshou!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N02
Reply.text: Anata wa daredesuka, soshite naze watashi o tasukete kureta nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N03
Reply.text: Watashitachi wa kurushinde iru subete no hito o tasukemasu. Koko ni kuru hitohamina, ooshitsu no atsukai o ukeru ni ataishimasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N04
Reply.text: Watashi no shitsumon ni kotaete kuremasendeshita!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N05
Reply.text: Kono basho ni wa, sekaijuu kara mottomo yuukande kashikoi hitobito ga atsumarimasu. Shikashi, sore wa karera o hakai suru dakedesu! Watashi wa min'na ni atte, sore ijoo saki ni susumanai yoo ni settoku shimasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N06
Reply.text: Kore ga watashi no michidesu - Iwan Guo no ashiato o ou kotodesu. Mokuhyoo e no ippotemae de tachidomaru ni wa amarini mo ooku no koto o keiken shite kimashita.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N07
Reply.text: Min'na oboe teru, kono hito mo oboe teru. Kare wa sukuwarenai, ikisugite iru.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N08
Reply.text: To iu koto wa, Iwan wa mada ikite iru no ka?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N09
Reply.text: Kare ni okotta koto wa shi yori mo warui kotodeari, sore to onaji kurai torikaeshinotsukanai monodesu…

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N10
Reply.text: Nazonazo wa moo juubundesu! Kare ga doko ni iru no ka oshietekudasai.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_1_N11
Reply.text: Wakarimashita… koreha jibun no me de minai to wakarimasenshi, soredewa teokuredesu… motto oku e susumimashou. Modotte kitara hanashimashou.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N01
Reply.text: Nan to iu seishin no tsuyo-sadeshou! Anata wa ten no koe ni teikoo suru koto ga dekimashita!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N02
Reply.text: Son'na ko to kiita koto nai yo.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N03
Reply.text: Kore wa, watashitachi ga tadashii sentaku o shita koto o imi shimasu. Kongen ni chikadzuki, tachikaeru chikara o mitsukeru koto ga dekiru keuna jinbutsuda. Watashitachi wa nan-nen mo anata o matte imashita.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N04
Reply.text: Hondai ni hairimasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N05
Reply.text: Anata wa, nan'nen mo mae ni hajimatta kyooki o tomeru yoo motome rarete imasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N06
Reply.text: Watashi wa korera no hitobito o sukuou to suru junbi ga dekite imasu. Demo oshietekudasai, koko de nani ga okotte iru nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N07
Reply.text: Tooi mukashi, watashitachi no sekai wa kanzendeshita. Kyodaina shuu, jinkoo 100 man-ri no toshi, anata no kawari ni kangaete kureru kikai! Subete ga shinpuru katsu meikakudeshita. Shikashi aru ni tsu, subete ga kuzure satta…

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N08
Reply.text: Kangaeru kikai? Kore wa yoi koto ni wa tsunagarimasen… Nani ga okottadeshou ka?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N09
Reply.text: Uchuu booei-gun ga mikakuninhikoobuttai o hakken, gekitsui shita no wa mitadeshou. Dooryoo to watashi wa, kono odorokubeki genshoo o kenkyuu suru tame ni haken sa remashita. Tooji no jookyoo wa hijoo ni kinpaku shite ori, terorisuto to notatakai no tame, kono kuni ni iru no wa kikendeshita. Sonotame, taikoku no choohoo kikan ya jimoto paruchizan no kanshi o ukenagara, watashitachiha isoide shigoto o shimashita.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N10
Reply.text: Anata no supiichi kara wa hotondo rikai dekimasen… Shikashi, furui sekai wa genzai no sekai yori mo shinsetsude wa nakatta yoodesu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N11
Reply.text: Moshika shitara… kangae mo shimasendeshita… nantoka sen'nai ni norikomu koto ga deki, sore ga machigainaku-sendatta toki, kooyoo-kan ga hajimarimashita. Shin'yaku, chookyooryoku zairyoo, kakushintekina gijutsu nado, don'na tenboo ga watashitachi o matteitadeshou ka… Shikashi, mitsukatta no wa shi dakedeshita. Sagyoo-in wa soochi no sharin no shita de nakunari, dooryoo no 3-ri wa 2-kakan no kenkyuu-chuu ni jisatsu shimashita. Shikashi, chuuoo konpaatomento no mippei chanbaa o insatsu shita toki ni saiaku no koto ga okorimashita…

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N12
Reply.text: Konna koto o subekide wa nakatta. Dooshite kono yoona meikakuna keikoku sain o mushi dekiru nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N13
Reply.text: Watashitachiha kagaku-shadesu! Meishin wa watashitachi ni wa kankei arimasen. Tsudzukemasu. Dooyara, sono shunkan made kyuushi jootaidatta jidoo-ka ga on ni natta yoodesu. Soozoo o zessuru nanika ga hajimatta… Dooryoo-tachi… Karera no karada wa mojidoori bakuhatsu shita… Atama no naka ni koe ga hibiita… Watashi wa ishiki o ushinai, gai no kono kyanpude mezameta… Tasuke o yondaga dare mo konakatta. Rajio wa chinmoku shite ita. Saigai ga okotta koto ni kidzukimashita.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N14
Reply.text: Sore de, anata ya anata to onajiyoona hito-tachi wa, anata no kookishin o mitasu tame ni sekai o hakai shita nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N15
Reply.text: Hai. Kono chishiki ga watashi o uchigawa kara mushibande ikimasu. Basse rarerubekidaga, itami o kanjinai. Shinu koto mo dekinai! Watashi ga nando jisatsu shiyou to shita ka wa kaminomizoshiru… hontooni hidokattadesu. Sekaijuu de jibun dake ga kodokuda to omotte imashita. Saisho no seizon-sha ga watashi no tokoro ni kita toki, yorokobi wa sugu ni kyoofu ni kawarimashita. Hitobito wa kawarimashita. Watashi ka anata jishin o mite kudasai. Anata no masuku ga nani o kakushite iru ka soozoo suru dake demo kowaidesu!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N16
Reply.text: Anata wa nani ni tsuite hanashite iru nodesu ka? Masuku wa osen sa reta kuuki kara watashitachi o mamotte kuremasu!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N17
Reply.text: Iitai koto wa nani demo iemasu. Osen sa reta kuuki ni shimashou. Shikashi, saiakuna no wa, sono soochi ga ima demo doosa shi tsudzukete iru kotoda. Soshite kansen-shoo wa taiki-chuu ni shin'nyuu shimasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N18
Reply.text: Dewa, kore o yamereba kuuki wa sumi, hito wa hito ni modoru nodeshou ka? Naze jibun de modotte kono debaisu no dengen o ofu ni shinakatta nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N19
Reply.text: Kare ni chikadzuku koto wa dekimasen! Soshite watashi mo hanareru koto ga dekimasen! Watashi wa eien ni kono imaimashii kikai no chikaku ni iru yoo ni norowa rete imasu. Kono kaibutsu o horoboshi ni kita mono ni kiku shika nai. Shikashi, mada dare mo seikoo shite imasen…

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N20b
Reply.text: Anata wa hitobito ni tadaina gai o ataemashita… Watashi wa kono basho to anata o koko to tomoni hakai shimasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N21b
Reply.text: Soreijoo wa motomemasen. Watashitachiha bunseki no tame ni shiryoo no ichibu o haruka hokusei ni hakobimashita. Soko ni gunjikagaku fukugoo-tai ga aru koto wa shitte imasu. Sono jinkoo chinoo wa osoraku mada hozon sa rete irudeshou. Sokode wa osoraku kono basho o hakai suru hoohoo ga mitsukarudeshou.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N22b
Reply.text: Watashi mo soko ni itanode, kono kikai seibutsu ni tsuite wa yoku shitte imasu. Sore wa mizukara o Orakuru to yobimasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N23b
Reply.text: Kooun o. Hokanohito ga shippaishita tokorode anata ga seikoo suru koto o negatte imasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N24b
Reply.text: Sayoonara. Futatabi au koto wa ari-soo ni arimasen.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N20a
Reply.text: Min'na o sukuu hoohoo o mitsukemasu. Tashika ni, sha ni amari chikadzukanakute mo kuruma no dengen o kiru koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N21a
Reply.text: Iwan Guo wa koko ni kita toki, ten no hikari ni tsuite nani ka iimashita. Soshite kare wa gaikoku no fune o mite mo mattaku odorokanakatta. Osoraku kare wa sudeni onajiyoona mono o mita koto ga arudeshou.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N22a
Reply.text: Watashi wa kare no yuujin no Ben Dorosseru o shitte imasu, kare wa osoraku kono koto ni tsuite nanika o shitte imasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N23a
Reply.text: Iku. Soshite, anata ni kooun ga otozuremasu yoo ni!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_2_N24a
Reply.text: Hitsuyoo ni naru to omoimasu.

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_3_N01
Reply.text: Watashi ga anata no tame ni dekiru koto wa kore ijoo arimasen. Itte, yarou to kimeta koto o yarimashou!

Reply.name: r4m2_Bar_Scientist_3_N02
Reply.text: Kantan'na kotode wa arimasenga, watashiniha dekimasu.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N01
Reply.text: Gaikoku hito! Anata wa kono ookina yobikake ni mada kusshite imasen. Sokode, watashi wa anata ni hitotsudake mooshiagetai koto ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N02
Reply.text: Kono subarashii yobikake wa nanidesu ka? Korehana ndesu ka?

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N03
Reply.text: Isoide, isoide, karera wa mite imasu. Kore wa, watashitachi no sekai ni nani ga okotte iru ka ni tsuite kataru hon no saigo no kopiidesu…

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_CrazyBook1_1_N04
Reply.text: Yamero, kureijii! Doko ni nigeta ndarou…

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N01
Reply.text: Kyoo wa choo hayai kuruma no senshukendesu. Dare demo sanka dekimasu!

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N02b
Reply.text: Kyoomi naidesu.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N02a
Reply.text: Kontesuto no sankasha ni naritaidesu.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N03a
Reply.text: 10000 koin no tesuuryoo o shiharau hitsuyoo ga ari, sonoochi 5000 koin wa kuruma no hoshookin to narimasu.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000158
Reply.text: Ó ìåíÿ åñòü ñïåöèàëüíàÿ ñòðàõîâêà, òàê ÷òî ìàøèíó ÿ âàì íå äàì.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000164
Reply.text: Õì, äåéñòâèòåëüíî. Òåì ïðîùå íàì è âàì.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N04aa
Reply.text: Dono shayoodesu ka? Anata wa nani ni tsuite hanashite iru nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N05aa
Reply.text: Kookana reeshingukaa o go teikyoo shi, mangaichi jiko o okoshita baai wa hoshookin kara hiyoo o henkin itashimasu.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N06aac
Reply.text: Son'na okane wa arimasen.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N06aab
Reply.text: Iie, watashi wa kono jooken ni manzoku shite imasen.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N06aaa
Reply.text: Naruhodo, dooi shimasu.

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N07aaa
Reply.text: Ruuru wa tsugi no tooridesu. Ayamatte sutaato shita baai wa make, sha o shoototsu sa seta baai wa makedesu. 1-I: 40000, 2-I: 20000, 3-I: 10000

Reply.name: r4_Racers_Men_1_N08aaa
Reply.text: Subete kuriadesu. IKU!

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N01
Reply.text: Saikin, watashitachi no chiiki de atarashii kao o mikakeru koto wa hotondo arimasen. Mishiranu hito yo, kutsuroide kudasai!

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P02
Reply.text: 1-ri sagashiteimasu…

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N03
Reply.text: Naze miru nodesu ka? Anata wa sudeni sekai de saikoo no basho, watashitachi no kagayakashii toshi o mitsukete imasu! Sono teien to funsui wa idaina shijin ni yotte utawa rete imasu.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P04
Reply.text: Doo iu wake ka, koko ni wa teien ya funsui ga miatarimasen.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N05
Reply.text: Korera no jaakuna rakushasa ga watashitachi no ie o shuugeki shi, yukute ni aru mono subete o hakai shite imasu. Hobo Mainichi, watashitachi wa karera no koogeki o gekitai shinakereba narimasen. Shitagatte, bunka-teki kinen-mono o tekisetsuna katachi de iji suru jikan ga arimasen. O kinodoku ni…

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P06
Reply.text: Soredemo, kanari chooki ni wataru ibento ni tsuite doko de shirabe rareru ka oshiete itadakemasu ka? Nan'nen mo mae ni, watashi ni totte taisetsunahito ga korera no basho o toorimashita.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N07
Reply.text: Watashitachiha hoomon-sha no kiroku o totte orimasen. Sudeni ooku no mondai o kakaete imasu. Anata o tasuke rareru no wa roojin dakedesu. Shikashi, karera wa zen'in satta.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_N09
Reply.text: Doo yatte shireba ii nodeshou ka? Hoka no toshi demo kiite mite kudasai. Moshika shitara, karera wa koogeki de sorehodo tsukarete wa inainode, anata o tasukete kureru kamo shiremasen. Kefu wa koko kara sorehodo tookunai. Atchi mite.

Reply.name: Gadad_Bar_Customer1_01_P10
Reply.text: Arigatoo, hoka no basho de ganbatte mimasu… [Kono basho ni tsuite bakuzento shita gimon ga arimasu. Koko ni iru hitohamina, nandaka hendesu.]

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: Oyasumi, tabibito. Tooi kuni de nani o sagashiteimasu ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N02
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa! Iwan to iu hitori no otoko ga, nan'nen mo mae ni anata no chiiki ni imashita. Kare wa ie ni kaette konakattanode, watashitachi wa ima doko demo kare o sagashiteimasu. Anata no machi ni mukashi no koto o oboete iru hito wa imasu ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: Kokode wa nani mo manabemasen. Kioku no ban'nindearu watashitachi no roojin-tachi wa, katsute atsumattaga, tada michi no hookoo e satte ikimashita. Watashitachi wa sorera o mitsukeyou to shite imasuga, imanotokoro seikoo shite imasen.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N04
Reply.text: Naze karera wa anata kara hanareta nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: Sensoo. Taema nai koogeki ni yori watashitachiha tsukare hate, sosen e no utsukushi-sa ya suuhai o wasurete shimaimashita. Watashitachi no subete no chikara wa ikinokoru tame ni sosogikoma remasu. Shikashi, utsukushi-sa ga ushinawa reta toki, ikiru kachi wa aru nodeshou ka? Anata wa watashi no tamashii o dainashi ni shimashita, mishiranu hito!

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N06
Reply.text: Anata-tachi wa kimyoodesu… Kami ni yotte, kimyoodesu.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N07
Reply.text: Jitsuwa, watashitachi no ensei-tai no hitori ga moosugu modotte kuru hazudesu. Chottomatte kudasai. Matte iru ma, watashitachi no komatte iru koto o tetsudatte kuremasen ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N08
Reply.text: Ittai nani ga hitsuyoona nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N09
Reply.text: Sekiyu wa watashitachi no seimei-sendesu. Kore ga nakereba, mashin wa doosa o teishi shi, koogeki-sha ni taishite muboobi ni natte shimaimasu.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N10
Reply.text: Ronri-teki. Sorede anata no abura wa doo natta nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N11
Reply.text: Kichoona ekitai no minamoto ga karete shimatta! Saikin made, watashitachiha kajifu no juumin kara kyookyuu o ukete imashita. Shikashi, moo dare mo soko ni ikou to wa shimasen. Jooheki kara deru no wa kiken sugimasu.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N12
Reply.text: Sekiyu no tanku o motte kite moraemasen ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N13
Reply.text: Hai. Tankuroorii o o watashi shimasunode, anata no kuruma wa toomen hokan sa sete itadakimasu.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N13b
Reply.text: Kiken sugiru ki ga shimasu. Watashi wa kore e no sanka o kyohi shimasu.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1_N13a
Reply.text: Sate, netabare shinai yoo ni chuui shite kudasai!

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N01
Reply.text: Yakusoku shita mono o watashitachi ni motte kite kuremashita ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N02b
Reply.text: Iie, isogi no yooji ga aru nodesuga, sugu ni o todoke shimasu.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N02
Reply.text: Kore ga anata no oirudesu.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N03
Reply.text: Zan'nenda! Sekiyude wa nani mo dekimasen. Yuiitsu no jooryuu senmonka ga yukue fumei ni narimashita. Shikashi, soochi wa gen'yude wa doosa shimasen.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N04
Reply.text: Juugyooin ni nani ga okotta nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N05
Reply.text: Kare wa marude watashitachi ga koko ni iru doobutsudearu ka no yoo ni nigete ikimashita. Kaeshite. Soo shinai to, kare wa watashitachi no hanashi ni sae mimi o katamukemasenga, moshika shitara anata ni hanashikakete kureru kamo shiremasen.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N06
Reply.text: Soshite sore wa doko de sagaseba ii nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N07
Reply.text: Kokode wa dokoni mo kakureru koto wa dekimasen. Mura wa subete yaka remashita. Osoraku kare wa, hoka no bashode wa naku, arihamu ni itta nodeshou.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_2_N08
Reply.text: Kaeshimasu. Watashi ga modotte kuru made ni, roojin o doko de sagaseba ii no ka seikaku ni oshiete moraeru koto o negatte imasu.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N01
Reply.text: Koo suru koto ni kimeta ndesu ka!?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N03
Reply.text: Sekiyu o motte kite kuremasen ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N04b
Reply.text: Tondemonai! Mondai wa jibun de kaiketsu shite kudasai.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_1a_N04a
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, sorede iidesu.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N01
Reply.text: Nani o sagashiteimasu ka?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N02
Reply.text: Tonarimachi no seibi-shi ga koko o toorikakatta nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N03
Reply.text: Sore wa okotta. Kare wa nandaka kimyoode, midarete ita.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N04
Reply.text: Kare wa tsugini doko e ikimashita ka?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Man1_1_N05
Reply.text: Kare wa sarani michi o susumimashita.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N01
Reply.text: Onegaidakara sawaranaide!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N02
Reply.text: Naze watashi ga anata o kizutsukenakereba naranai nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N03
Reply.text: Naze hitobito ga otagai o goomon shi tari koroshi tari suru no ka o doo yatte shiru koto ga dekirudeshou ka. Hanatte oite kudasai!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N04
Reply.text: Doo shita no?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N05
Reply.text: Nani mo shiranainode nani mo iimasen!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N06
Reply.text: Dooyara kono hito wa kanzen ni ki ga kurutte shimatta yooda. Watashitachi wa kare o kono sugata de okurikaesanakereba narimasenga, kare ga Kefu no juumin o tasukeru koto ga dekiru kanoosei wa hikuideshou.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N07
Reply.text: Yuuki ga nai! Ika sete! Sekai ni mada ikite iru hito ga iru no ka doo ka shiritaidesu. Soodenakereba, watashi ga tatakau imi wa arimasen. Demo, watashi wa karera no tokoro ni wa modorimasen! Ichido mo nai!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N07b
Reply.text: Nani ga okotta no ka oshietekudasai?

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N08b
Reply.text: Osoroshii shinjitsu ga watashi ni akiraka ni narimashita. Kono chishiki o motte ikiteikeru ka wakarimasen. Iya, gamandekinai! Zenbu usoda!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N09b
Reply.text: Kiitekudasai, anata no kuruma wa sabaku o koeru koto ga dekimasu. Hokusei ni susumi tsudzukeru to, kakki to shiawasena hitobito ni michita toshi ga mitsukarudeshou. Moshika shitara, midori no soogen ni kakoma reta soko ni, kokoro no yasuragi ga mitsukaru kamo shiremasen.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N10b
Reply.text: Sore de, mada doko ka ni hito ga imasu ka? Sore de, watashi o karera no tokoro ni ika sete kureta nodesu ka? Arigatoo, moshika shitara sukuwa reru kamo!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N11b
Reply.text: Soshite, nantoka shite Kefu kara nukedasanakereba narimasen.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N07a
Reply.text: Dakara buryoku kooshi suru shika nai nda yo.

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N08a
Reply.text: Shinu yori wa ii yo!

Reply.name: r4m1_SomeWhere_Engineer_1_N09a
Reply.text: Kuso. Nani ga awarena otoko o son'nani kowagara seta nodeshou ka? Soshite ima, watashi wa Kefu de nan to iudeshou ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N01
Reply.text: Seibi-shi ga issho ni inai nodesuga, mitsukarimashita ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N02
Reply.text: Zan'nen'nagara mekanikku o torimodosu koto wa dekimasendeshita. Kare wa nanika ni obiete jisatsu shita.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N03
Reply.text: Kono koto o kiite totemo kanashiidesu… Shikashi, anata wa dekiru kagiri no koto o shita to shinjite imasu.

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N04
Reply.text: Tsumari, oboete iru hito no tame ni doko o sagaseba ii no ka oshiete itadakemasu ka?

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N05
Reply.text: Hai, karera no mura o mitsukemashita. Kaigande wa roojin-tachi ga mina kara kakurete imasu. Tsugi no koogeki kara kaifuku shitara sugu ni karera o otte ensei-tai o okurimasu. Rippana hito ga koya ni atsumaru no wa yokunai!

Reply.name: Kef_Bar_Customer1_3_N06
Reply.text: Arigatoo, anata no yasashii kotoba o karera ni tsutaemasu.

Reply.name: Buhara_Outside_Leader_1_N01
Reply.text: Karera wa watashitachi o mitsukemashita, dekiru hito wa jibun o sukutte kudasai!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000072
Reply.text: Matte! Anshin shite kimasu.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000073
Reply.text: [Yodan] Kare wa goku futsuu ni miemasu…|Doo yatte watashitachi o mitsuketa nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000074
Reply.text: Machi kara kita shinsetsuna dansei ga watashi ni michi o oshiete kuremashita. Kare wa, sugu ni kyuujotai ga anata no tame ni haken sa rerudarou to iimashita.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000075
Reply.text: Tsuini kono shunkan ga yattekimashita. Kyoodai-tachi, watashitachi wa moo kakureru koto wa dekimasen. Watashitachiha tatakai ni idomimasu. Soshite, hitsuyoonioojite watashitachiha shinudeshou!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000076
Reply.text: Anata wa nani ni tsuite hanashite iru nodesu ka? Kareradesu…

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000077
Reply.text: Nani mo wakarimasendeshita ka? Moosukoshi jikan ga aru to omoimasu. Zehi o tachiyori kudasai.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000080
Reply.text: Nani no hanashi? Teki ga koogeki shite kuru no ni, anata wa koko de oshaberi o shite imasu!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000078
Reply.text: Saigo ni, koko de nani ga okotte iru no ka setsumei shite kudasai.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000079
Reply.text: Nan-nen mo zen, watashi-tachi no chiiki wa masani hana ga sakihokoru teien de shita. Watashi-tachi wa saigai kara tachinaori, seikatsu o saiken shi hajimemashita. Sorekara watashi-tachi wa, hitobito ga tokidoki kimyoona koodoo o suru koto ni kidzuki hajimemashita. Karera no me wa tokiniha kyooki no yorokobi de kagayaki, tokiniha kuroi ikari de kagayakimasu.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000081
Reply.text: Rikai shi hajimete iru to omoimasu…

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000082
Reply.text: Saisho wa daremoga kanjoo o osaete itaga, aru hi subete ga kuzure satta. Aru shinsetsuna dansei wa kazoku o osoimashitaga, sore o oboete imasendeshita. Kare wa shokei sa re, kyoofu ga watashitachi no kokoro ni teichaku shimashita. Midjikana hito-tachi o shinrai dekinaku narimashita. Jibun jishin o shinrai suru koto wa fukanoodeshita.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000083
Reply.text: Kore wa, toraedokoro no nai sanzoku ga inai koto o imi shimasu.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000084
Reply.text: Zan'nen'nagara sono yoodesu ne. Jikangatatsu ni tsurete, dooyoo no kyooki no saikuru o motsu hitobito ga guruupu o keisei shi, otagai o kari hajimemashita. Kunan no nengetsu o hete, ikinokotta no wa hon'no wazukadeshita.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000085
Reply.text: Naze sono kyooki no eikyoo o ukenakatta nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000086
Reply.text: Tooji demo watashitachi wa totemo toshi o totte imashita. Kanjoo ga tsuyoi no wa wakamono ni ooi. Soshite watashitachi no unmei wa, kioku o hozon shi, shisha o itamu kotodesu. Nani ga okotta no ka o rikai shita toki, watashitachiha daitoshi o hanare, kyoojin no me kara kakureyou to shimashita. Shikashi, kore ga eien'nitsudzuku wake wa arimasen. Ima, watashitachiha hakken sa re, sugu ni korosa rerudeshou. Sudeni teki ga chikadzuite iru no o kanjimasu…

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000087
Reply.text: Iwan ni tsuite shitte iru koto o subete hanasu made, shina semasen!

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000088
Reply.text: Oso sugiru. Karera wa koogeki shite imasu.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000089
Reply.text: Tatakau no o tetsudatte ageru yo!

Reply.name: Buhara_Outside_Leader_2_N01
Reply.text: Watashitachiha katta ga, karera wa modotte kurudarou. Sore wa jikan no mondaidesu. Watashitachi ni wa moo tatakau chikara wa nokotte inai.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000091
Reply.text: Nani o suru ka? Anata o koko ni oite oku wake ni wa ikimasen! Koko kara doo yatte tsureteitte moraemasu ka?

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000092
Reply.text: Chikaku ni minato waaruga fune wa nokotte inai. Subete no kiki wa doosa shimasuga, kakunin shimashita.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000093
Reply.text: Iidesu ne, watashi wa fune o yonde anata o ippan no hito ga sunde iru basho ni hinan sa seru koto ga dekiru soochi o motte imasu.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_npc_000094
Reply.text: Nanto iu kooundeshou. Konna koto ga kanooda to iu koto ga shinji raremasen.

Reply.name: r4_Dlg_pl_000095
Reply.text: Minato ga doko ni aru no ka oshietekudasai. Watashi mo dookoo shite fune o yobimasu.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N01
Reply.text: Yamero, ikyooto! Naze shintaku no shukufuku sa reta ji ni kita nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N02
Reply.text: Watashi wa jibun no shitsumon ni taisuru kotae o motomete Orakuru ni kimashita.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N03
Reply.text: Shin no shinja igai ni wa dare mo kare o miru koto ga dekimasen.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N042
Reply.text: Watashi wa kokorokara shinja ni naritai to negatte imasu. Watashi o anata no nakama ni kuwaete kudasai.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N052
Reply.text: Anata no ganboo wa shoosan ni ataishimasu, kimyoodesu. Kako no moosoo o kyohi suru ni wa, gisei o harawanakereba narimasen! Junbi wa dekita ka?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N062
Reply.text: Watashi no ketsudan wa yuruginai monodesu. Anata no shinkoo ni wa don'na gisei ga hitsuyoodesu ka?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N072
Reply.text: Tanin no chi o katsuboo suru mono ni wa shintaku o jukukoo suru shikaku wanai! Anata no buki o subete watashitachi ni sasagete, mi o kiyomemashou!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N082
Reply.text: Shikashi, watashi wa nagatabi no kiken ni taishite muboobideari tsudzukemasu!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N092
Reply.text: Orakuru wa anata no tabi o jihibukaku mamotte kurerudeshou.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1022
Reply.text: Anata wa motome sugite imasu. Higaisha igai ni kare ni au hoohoo wa aru nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1122
Reply.text: Tsuneni betsu no hoohoo ga arimasu. Shikashi, sore wa fukuzatsude chimei-tekidesu.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1222
Reply.text: Watashi wa kon'nan ni wa narete imasu. Nani o shinakereba naranai no ka oshietekudasai.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1322
Reply.text: Ikeru shisha no machi no iriguchi o mamoru kootetsu no kaibutsu no atama o motte kite kudasai.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1422
Reply.text: Watashi wa otogibanashi o shinjite imasenga, soreha inshoo-tekidesu. Eihei o taosu saizen no hoohoo wa nanidesu ka?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1522
Reply.text: Kare o kooheina ichitaiichi no kettoo ni izanaou to shite kudasai. Soo sureba, katsu chansu ga umaremasu. Chiisai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000201
Reply.text: Sugu ni oidasu yo!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N16222
Reply.text: Muzukashii sentakudesu… Buki o gisei ni suru koto ni dooi suru to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000202
Reply.text: Jibun no ketsudan o kookai suru koto wa arimasen. Jihibukai shintaku-sha ga sono chie o anata ni shea shite kurerudeshou!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000203
Reply.text: Kare no adobaisu ga, watashi ga koko ni kuru made ni keiken shita koto no kachi ga aru monodearu koto o negatte imasu.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N16221
Reply.text: Kaibutsu no kubi o motte kimasu!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1021
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, dooi shimasu. Buki o oroshite kudasai…

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N1121
Reply.text: Hajimemashite, atarashiku mitsuketa kyoodai! Orakuru ni shitagatte, kare no chie ni kuwawatte kudasai!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000204
Reply.text: Soredake no kachi ga atta to omoimasu.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N041
Reply.text: Watashi no jamawosuru anata wa nanimonodesu ka? Michi o hazureru! Anata to chatto suru jikan ga arimasen!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_1_N051
Reply.text: Kare wa watashitachi o odoshite iru nodesu! Kyoodai-tachi yo, ikyooto o koogeki shite kudasai!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000195
Reply.text: Kono mondai wa buryoku de kaiketsu shinakereba naranai.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N01
Reply.text: Monsutaa o taosu koto ga dekimashita ka?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N022
Reply.text: Kore ga kare no atamadesu! Watashi wa anata ga motometa koto o shimashita.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N032
Reply.text: Hajimemashite, atarashiku mitsuketa kyoodai! Orakuru ni shitagatte, kare no chie ni kuwawatte kudasai!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N042
Reply.text: Kore ga watashi ga koko made nagai michinori o kita riyuudesu.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearOracle_ODefenders_2_N021
Reply.text: Kore made no tokoro, watashi wa sore ni taisho suru koto ga dekimasendeshita.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N01
Reply.text: Joomyoo no mono yo, yokumo watashi no heiwa o midasu monoda! Kamigami wa watashi no kuchi o tooshite katarimasu, soshite watashi wa anata no sasaina iiarasoi nado ki ni shimasen!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P02
Reply.text: Watashi no shitsumon ni kotaete, yoku nemutte kudasai.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N03
Reply.text: Anata wa, itsumo watashi ni kumotsu o motte kuru hito-tachi to wa chigaimasu… Watashi no yogen wa kichoona okurimonodesu, watashi wa anata ni ooku no mikaeri o yookyuu shimasu. Junbi wa dekita ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P04
Reply.text: Ima akirameru tame ni sekai no hanbun o koeta wakede wa arimasen! Hitsuyoona koto o itte kudasai.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N05
Reply.text: Yogen no tame ni wa, tetsu no kaibutsu no yoosai, matawa orokamono ga yobu tokoro no shisha no toshi de mitsukaru aatifakuto ga 2-tsu hitsuyoodesu. Itsumo wa 1-dai shika tanomanai nodesuga, anata wa kuruma o o-mochi de, anata no kao ni wa ooku no tatakai no ato ga miemasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P06
Reply.text: Korera no aatifakuto wa nanidesu ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_N07
Reply.text: Mireba sugu ni wakarimasu. Soodenainara, anata wa watashi no tasuke o ukeru kachi ga arimasen. Iku!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_1_P08
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, sugu ni modorimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N01
Reply.text: Yoku ganbatta ne, hooroo-sha.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P02
Reply.text: Hai, tanoma rete ita mono o motte kimashita.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N03
Reply.text: Korera no shoosai ni yori, mondai wa iyoiyo zenshin shimasu. Jibun ga kami ni shukufuku sa rete iru to kangaete kudasai. Anata no shitsumon ni mimi o katamukemasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P042
Reply.text: Watashi no chichi wa korosa remashita. Watashi wa kare o koroshita han'nin o mitsukete basshitai nodesu!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N052
Reply.text: Watashi wa joomyoo no mono no koto ni wa hotondo kanshin ga arimasenga, anata no hooshi no taika to shite, anata o tasukemasu. Bunseki no tame no deeta o shuushuu suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Zenbu oshietekudasai.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P062
Reply.text: Watashinoie wa shi no sabaku no mukoo-gawa, azuma kara kita asashin ni osowa remashita. Watashi mo karera o otte ikitai nodesuga, kono osoroshii basho de doo yatte ikite ikeba ii no ka dare mo shirimasen.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N072
Reply.text: Kore wa niku no ikimono ni totte wa kantan'na kotode wa arimasen. Anata no te no naka ni aru buttai wa nanidesu ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P082
Reply.text: Kono disuku wa watashi no chichi no monodeshita. Karera wa sore o yomu koto ga dekiru to iimasu. Osoraku soko ni kaka rete iru koto wa, han'nin o mitsukete dooki o rikai suru no ni yakudatsudeshou.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P041
Reply.text: Watashi no chichi no namae wa Iwan Guo de, tanken-kadeshita. Nan'nen mo mae ni kare wa yukue fumei ni nari, watashi o nokoshite kare no yuujin ni sodatete moraimashita. Saikin, nikuya ga watashitachi no mura o shuugeki shi, zen'in o koroshimashita…

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N051
Reply.text: Shitsumon ga kikoemasendeshita. Kono hito-tachi ga darena no ka shiritaidesu ka? Fukushuu shitaidesu ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P061
Reply.text: Hai. Tsumari, iie. Chichi wa mada ikite iru to omou node, sagashitai to omotte imasu. Shikashi, watashinoie e no shuugeki ga kare no shissoo to kankeigaaru to kakushin shite imasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_N071
Reply.text: Rikai suru. Iwan Guo no shozai wa watashiniha fumeidesu. Muda ni koko made kita no wa zan'nenda yo, hooroo-sha yo. Sayoonara.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_2_P081
Reply.text: Mattekudasai, watashi wa tebura de kita wakede wa arimasen. Kono disuku wa watashi no chichi no monodeshita. Karera wa sore o yomu koto ga dekiru to iimasu. Osoraku soko ni kaka rete iru koto ga michi o shimeshite kurerudeshou ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N01
Reply.text: Kon'na mono wa nagaiai mita koto ga arimasen. Soshite tashika ni, watashi no tokoro ni sono yoona irai o shite kita hito wa dare mo imasen. Ichiban saisho no korodesuga…

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N02
Reply.text: Kore ga watashi no yuiitsu no kiboodesu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N03
Reply.text: Anata ga motte kita yunitto ga yakunitachimasu… Osoraku subete ga umaku ikudeshou. Demo, watashi ga omoidasu no o tetsudatte kudasai.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N04
Reply.text: Mochiron, nani o subeki ka oshietekudasai!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N05
Reply.text: Ten no hikari ga watashi no kioku no kurayami o terasu yoo ni, kyuutai no enerugii o shuuchuu sa sete kudasai.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N06
Reply.text: Kono nazo wa yami no senjuumin-tachi ni makasete kudasai! Watashi ga nani o subeki ka o seikaku ni oshietekudasai.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N07
Reply.text: Watashi no san'nin no joshu o tsurete, san'nin no menhiru no tokoro e tsureteitte kudasai. Koko, koko, soshite koko. Rimooto memori mojuuru o koosei shimasu. Watashi o suuhai suru yaban hito-tachi ga jama o shinai yoo ni shite kudasai.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_3_N08
Reply.text: Sugu ni shuppatsu shimasu. Kiboo wa aru yo!
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('r3m2_OracleMemory'); TActivate('trVK1'); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot1' ); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot2' ); AddQuestItem( 'quest_repair_robot3' ); GetPlayerVehicle():SetCustomLinearVelocity(0); EndConversation()

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N01
Reply.text: Atarashii mojuuru no tsuika ni yori, kinoo ga oohaba ni zooka shimashita. Mada subete no shisutemu no kanzen'na chekku ga owatte inainode, shibaraku jikan ga kakarimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N02
Reply.text: Shikashi, kore dake no sagyoo o hete, sukunakutomo nani ka meikaku ni ierudeshou ka?!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N031
Reply.text: Kono disuku wa jissai ni wa Iwan Guo no monodeshita. Kore wa gendai sekai ni kansuru tairyoo no deeta o fukumu nikkidesu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N041
Reply.text: Isoide saishin no tookoo o yondekudasai!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N051
Reply.text: Disuku no mokuji o yonde miru to… saigo no entori: [Ensei no junbi].

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N061
Reply.text: Hai, kore ga hitsuyoona monodesu! Yomu!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N071
Reply.text: Shikashi, jooki no joohoo wa fukuzatsuna kagi de hogo sa rete ori, kaidoku ni wa suu-nen kakaru tame, shutoku suru koto wa fukanoodesu. Watashi no rikaide wa, kono jookyoode wa kore wa ukeire raremasen.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N081
Reply.text: Kono kii ga hoka ni nan'na no ka wakarimasen.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N091
Reply.text: Seishitsu kara handan suru to, koreha-betsu no disukudearu kanoosei ga 96.7% arimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N101
Reply.text: Hoka no disuku wa nanidesu ka? Watashi wa anata no adobaisu o motomete takusan tabi o shita no ni, purasuchikku-hen o sagasu tame ni watashi o okurimasu ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N111
Reply.text: Sagaseba mitsukarudeshou. Kagi wa Iwan no mochimono no naka ni kakusa rete iru kamo shirenai.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N121
Reply.text: Mooichido chichi no ie o otozureru kachi wa aru kamo shirenai.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N032
Reply.text: Disuku no mokuji kara handan suru to, disukuni wa hooshasei sabaku o hitobito ga oodan dekiru yoo ni suru soochi no zu ga fukuma rete iruto 100% no kakuritsu de iemasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N042
Reply.text: Subarashii! Hitsuyoona mono dake o! Tsudzukete, hoka ni nani ka wakarimashita ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N052
Reply.text: Mata, disukuni wa, Iwan Guo to iu namae no jinbutsu ni kansuru ooku no joohoo ga fukuma rete imasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N062
Reply.text: Tsumari, watashitachi wa tadashikatta nodesu! Soshite naki chichi wa kono otoko no unmei to missetsu ni kakawatte iru nodesu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N072
Reply.text: Shikashi, jooki no joohoo wa hijoo ni fukuzatsuna kagi de hogo sa rete ori, sono fukugoo ni wa suu-nen kakaru tame, shutoku suru koto wa dekimasen. Watashi no rikaide wa, kono jookyoode wa ukeire raremasen.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N082
Reply.text: Moohitotsu no kagi wa nanidesu ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N092
Reply.text: Sono naga-sa kara handan suru to, koreha-betsu no enbandearu kanoosei ga 96.7% arimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N102
Reply.text: Doko de kare o sagaseba ii nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N112
Reply.text: Issho ni kita hito ni kiite miyou! Kanojo wa kotae o motte imasu. Sayoonara.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_4_N122
Reply.text: Nee, chottomatte! Mada hanashi ga owatte inai nodesu!.. Risa ni ikutsu ka shitsumon shinakereba naranai yoodesu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N01
Reply.text: Anata wa kagi o motte modotte kimashita.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N02
Reply.text: Hai, kochira ga 2-mai-me no disukudesu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N03
Reply.text: Sore o watashi ni watashite, henji o machimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N04
Reply.text: Hoka ni nani ga nokotte irudeshou ka? Omachi shite orimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N05b
Reply.text: Disuku no naiyoo o yomitoru koto ga dekimashita. Kore wa hontooni anata no otoosan no nikkidesu. Joohoo zentai o bunseki suru ni wa jikan ga kakarimasuga, omona shitsumon ni wa ima sugu kotaeru koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N06b
Reply.text: Doko de kare o sagaseba ii no ka hayaku oshietekudasai!

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N05a
Reply.text: Disuku ni kakikoma rete iru naiyoo o yomitoru koto ga dekimashita. Kore wa jissai ni wa Iwan Guo no nikkideari, kare wa tabi to hakken o setsumei shite imasu. Joohoo zentai o bunseki suru ni wa jikan ga kakarimasuga, omona shitsumon ni wa ima sugu kotaeru koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N06a
Reply.text: Iwan wa shi no sabaku ni imashita ka? Suna o wataru hoohoo no hinto ga disuku ni aru hazudesu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N07a
Reply.text: Saigo no entori wa tsugi no yoo ni narimasu: [Watashi no mokuhyoo wa kore made ijoo ni chikadzuite imasu. Hitsuyoona joohoo wa subete shuushuu shi, dekiru kagiri no junbi o shimashita. Ryokoo o okurasete mo imi ga arimasen. Sabaku no mukoo-gawa ni mo hito ga sunde iru kamo shirenaiga, watashi wa son'na koto wa kinishinai. Shikashi, karera wa watashi ni michi o shimesu koto wa dekimasu. Moshi watashi no keikaku ga seikoo sureba, sekai wa yoriyoi hookoo ni kawarudeshou. Soodenakute mo, watashiniha ushinau mono wa nani mo arimasen].

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N08a
Reply.text: Hitsuyoona mono ga kitto mitsukaru to omoimashita! Soko ni hoka ni nani ga kaka rete iru ka o sugu ni yonde kudasai.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N09a
Reply.text: Disukuni wa, sabaku no kibishii kishoo jooken ni torakku o sonaeru no ni yakudatsu aojashin ga fukuma rete imasu. Kopii o sakusei shimasu. Sore o senmonka ni misereba, debaisu o sai sakusei shite moraemasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N10a
Reply.text: Ato wa masutaa o mitsukeru dakedesu. Middogarudo ga kore o tetsudatte kureru to omoimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_Oracle_Oracle_5_N11a
Reply.text: Nokori no joohoo ni kanshite wa, kono deeta wa kiken sugite, muchina hitobito ni wa shinrai dekimasen. Toki ga kitara, watashi wa sorera o jinrui no sairyoo no hitobito to kyooyuu shimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000205
Reply.text: Mada watashi o damashita no ne! Maa, sukunakutomo hitsuyoona joohoo wa nyuushu dekimashita…

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N01
Reply.text: Hisashiburini dare mo watashi ni ai ni kimasendeshita. Naze kujoo o itta nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N02
Reply.text: Sesu jidai no anata no furui yuujin ga watashi ni nimotsu o kureru yoo ni tanonda nodesu.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N03
Reply.text: Roojin o shiawaseni shimashita. ee to, mukashi wa arimashita… Ima to wa chigaimasu. Daremoga tatakattari, juugeki shi tari, watashi no hata o arashi tari shite imasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N04
Reply.text: Hontooni taihen'na jikidesu… Anata no hata wa doo narimashita ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N05
Reply.text: Darekaga watashi no sakumotsu o fumitsuke, torakku de oshitaoshi tari, hi o tsuke tari shite, kimyoona ato o nokoshimashita.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N06
Reply.text: Nita yoona mono o sudeni mita yoona ki ga shimasu. Anata no sakumotsu ga doko ni aru no ka oshietekudasai. Doko ni ikubeki ka oshiemasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N07
Reply.text: Sugu chikaku, deguchi no migigawa ni arimasu. Tokorode, pakkeeji to kaiwa o arigatoo.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_2_N08
Reply.text: Ochikara ni narete, ureshiidesu. Hyooshiki o mi ni itte mimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N01
Reply.text: Tabibitoyo, kon'na hisan'na basho de nani o sagashite iru nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N02
Reply.text: Orakuru o sagashiteimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N03
Reply.text: Kare wa koko ni inai. Hokusei ni doraibu shimasu. Moshika shitara, sokode anata no mokuteki ga mitsukaru kamo shiremasen. Sate, ikanakereba narimasen. Fiirudo o seiri suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

Reply.name: r3m2_AloneDruid1_1_N04
Reply.text: Anata no hata wa doo narimashita ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001293
Reply.text: Darekaga watashi no sakumotsu o fumitsuke, torakku de oshitaoshi tari, hi o tsuke tari shite, kimyoona ato o nokoshimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001294
Reply.text: Nita yoona mono o sudeni mita yoona ki ga shimasu. Anata no sakumotsu ga doko ni aru no ka oshietekudasai. Doko ni ikubeki ka oshiemasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001295
Reply.text: Sugu chikaku, deguchi no migigawa ni arimasu. Fiirudo to kaiwa o arigatoogozaimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001296
Reply.text: Yorokonde otetsudai sa sete itadakimasu. Hyooshiki o mi ni itte mimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001297
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, ryokoo-sha-san.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001298
Reply.text: Mondai ga atta nodesu. Orakuru no Shimobe tachi guruupu to funaka ni natte shimatta nodesu…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001299
Reply.text: Orakuru no Shimobe tachi ga anata to kakawaritakunai no wa wakatte imasu. Anata no genkin junbikin no 15 paasento to iu sasayakana hooshuu de, anata ga karera no ma de nanrakano ken'i o kakutoku suru no o tetsudau koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001301
Reply.text: Mushiro kotowaritaidesu ne.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001300
Reply.text: Mochiron dooi shimasu.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard2_1_N01
Reply.text: Shageki o yamete kudasai! Anata-tachi wa watashitachi no teki no yoo ni natte kite imasu! Mooshiwakearimasenga, ryokoo-sha-san, anata o hokanohito to machigaemashita.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P02
Reply.text: Daijoobu, hotondo mukizudatta. Ittai don'na bashona nodeshou ka? Soshite naze hajimete atta hito o koogeki suru nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N03
Reply.text: Ima wa muzukashii jidaidesu. Shuui ni wa kiken ga afurete imasu. Kootetsu no monsutaa ga nemuri kara mezame, satsuriku o hajimemasu. Soshite, sorera wa anata no kaato ni yoku nite imasu.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P04
Reply.text: Keikoku o arigatoo. Motto ki o tsukemasu.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N05
Reply.text: Watashitachi no domein ni kita kikkake wa nanidesu ka?

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_P06
Reply.text: Orakuru o sagashi ni koko ni kimashita.

Reply.name: Fist_ambush_guard1_1_N07
Reply.text: Kore ni kanshite anata o tasukeru koto ga dekiru no wa dai doruido dakedesu. Kare dake ga soko ni tootatsu suru hoohoo o shitte imasu. Sete ni itte kudasai, kiwotsukete kudasai.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N01
Reply.text: Yoki tabibitoyo, watashitachi no shinseina mori de anata ni aisatsu shimasu.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindNative') if QuestStatus('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid')==Q_CANBEGIVEN then TakeQuest('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid') end CompleteQuest('r3m1_TalkWithMainDruid')

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P02
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, aakudoruido. Anata wa shintaku-sho e no michi o shitte iru to kikimashita. Kare to hanasanakereba narimasen.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N03
Reply.text: Shintaku wa hito ni kiken'na chishiki o ataeru kanoosei ga arimasu… Anata ga sore o kenmei ni shiyoo suru koto o shoomei shite kudasai, soo sureba doko ni ikubeki ka o oshiete mimashou.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P04
Reply.text: Choosen suru junbi wa dekite imasu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N05
Reply.text: Watashitachi no seiiki wa bootoku sa remashita. Watashitachi ga hahanaru chikyuu no na no shita ni gishiki o okonaeru yoo ni, sore o jooka shite kudasai.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P06
Reply.text: Sokode nani ga okotta??

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_N07
Reply.text: Arayuru ikimono ni tekitai suru kootetsu no kaibutsu ga shinju no shuui no mori o hakai shite ori, kono ma made wa shinju wa horonde shimau! Karera o sara sete kudasai!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_1_P08
Reply.text: Kon'na kiken'na me ni atta no wa hajimeteda!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_2_N01
Reply.text: Watashitachi no seiiki ni wa tekitai-tekina sonzai ga sonzai shinai nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_2_P02
Reply.text: Madadesuga, sugu ni hajimeta koto o owara seru tsumoridesu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N01
Reply.text: Gaikoku hito wa shin'yoo dekinai to wakatte imashita!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P02
Reply.text: Mattekudasai, watashi wa anata no yookyuu-doori ni subete yarimashita.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N03
Reply.text: Nani o shita no ka shirimasenga, teki o okora seta dakedesu. Monsutaa ga anata o tsuiseki shi, ima watashitachi no machi ni chikadzuite imasu!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P04
Reply.text: Sen wa watashi ga omotte ita yori mo kookatsudearu koto ga hanmei shimashita. Watashi wa yakusoku o yaburimasen - teki wa haiboku shimasu!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N05
Reply.text: Watashitachiha tekiwotaosu dakede wa juubunde wanai koto ni kidzukimashita. Haiboku shita teki no kawari ni aratana teki ga shutsugen shinai yoo ni chuui suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P06
Reply.text: Rikai suru. Kaibutsu no kakurega ga doko ni aru ka shitte imasu ka?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N07
Reply.text: Saikin no jishin no ato, hokutoo-bu ni arawareta jimen no ana kara monsutaa ga dete kite iruto sukauto-ra ga hookoku shita bakarida.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P08
Reply.text: Karera no shingeki o tomeru yuiitsu no hoohoo wa, kono dookutsu o futatabi umeru koto no yooda.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N09
Reply.text: Watashitachi mo kore ni tsuite kangaemashita. Watashitachiha hahanaru chikyuu ni, kegareta ikimono-tachi o nomikomu yoo yobikakeru hoohoo o motte imasu. Shikashi, karera no kakurega ni hijoo ni chikadzuku hitsuyoo ga arimasu - dare mo yuuki ga arimasen…

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P10
Reply.text: Anata ga watashi o settoku shita to kangaete kudasai. Gutaitekini nani o suruhitsuyoogaaru nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_N11
Reply.text: Inori no ishi o ana no sugu tonari ni oki, anata mo attoo sa renai yoo ni sugu ni atozusari shite kudasai.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_3_P12
Reply.text: Shoori o motte matte ite kudasai. Soreto, Orakuru ni tsuite mo oshiete moratta hoo ga iidesu ne!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_N01
Reply.text: Monsutaa ga watashitachi no tochi kara satte shimaimashita. Arigatoo!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_P02
Reply.text: Watashi wa doruido kyoo no taigi ni taisuru chuusei o shoomei suru no ni juubun'na koodoo o totta to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_N03
Reply.text: Orakuru ga doko ni sunde iru no ka oshieteageru. Kita de sagashite kudasai. Himitsu no michi wa koko kara hajimarimasu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_4_P04
Reply.text: Ima, watashi wa kare o mitsukemasu. Wakare.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001291
Reply.text: Aa, ato hitotsu. Shuppatsu suru mae ni fiooni kyoodai o tazunete itadakemasu ka? Kare wa anata ni ki ga aru yoodesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001292
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, kangaete mimasu.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_N01
Reply.text: Fuan! Teki wa koohoo kara sematte kuru! Subete no juu kara happoo shite kudasai!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_P022
Reply.text: Mattekudasai, watashi wa heiwa ni kimasu!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearFist_Guard1_1_P021
Reply.text: Juu no gengo wa watashi ni totte najimi no aru monodesu.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: Anata wa kootetsu no kemono ni notte yattekimashita. Yuujin yo, watashitachi wa anata ni keii o arawashimasu.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindNative'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('r3m1_FindMoreNative'); SetTolerance(1100, 1019, RS_NEUTRAL); if QuestStatus('r3m1_FindMoreNative')==Q_TAKEN then AddHistory( 'r3_Fist_Fight_1' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); else AddHistory( 'r3_v2_Uluk_FirstTime_1' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); end

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: Orakuru ni awanakereba narimasen.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: Watashitachi wa kare no ie no koto o shiru koto o yurusa rete imasen. Kimagurena doruido soo dake ga kono chishiki o mochi, sore o jibun no rieki no tame ni riyoo shimasu.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P04
Reply.text: Dakara watashi wa karera no tokoro ni ikanakereba narimasen.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: Matte! Karera wa tondemonai nedan o seikyuu shimasu! Soshite karera wa watashitachi to chigatte, mishiranu hito ni taishite hijoo ni koogeki-tekidesu. Karera no haidoruido o tsukamaeru no o tetsudatte kudasai. Soo sureba, hitsuyoonamono ga subete mitsukarudeshou. Kare o machi kara sasoidaseba, joshu to watashi ga taisho shimasu. Kite imasu ka? Tsuika ryookin mo itadakimasu!

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P062
Reply.text: Nanigadekiruka mite mimashou. Shikashi, nanika mondai ga okottara, watashi wa anata no koto o shirimasenshi, anata mo watashinokoto o shirimasen.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_1_P061
Reply.text: Nani ga dekirudeshou ka! Watashi wa kesshite uragiri nado wa shimasen!

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_N01
Reply.text: Anata wa watashitachi o totemo tasukete kuremashita. Furui doruido soo wa watashitachi no shuukyoo ni taisuru saigo no shoogaideshita. Korekara wa kuruma ga watashitachi no seikatsu ni hairikomi, seikatsu o yori yoi mono ni shite kurerudeshou.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_P02
Reply.text: Hontooni Orakuru o miru hitsuyoo ga aru dakedesu.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_N03
Reply.text: Watashitachiha doruido soo kara soko e no michi o mitsukeru koto ga dekimashita. Michi wa aka rete imasu! Tasuketekurete arigatoo. Kore ga anata no hooshuudesu.

Reply.name: Uluc_Bar_Customer1_2_P04
Reply.text: Mokuhyoo wa tassei dekimashitaga, jibun no koodoo ga tadashikatta ka doo ka wa wakarimasen…

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N01
Reply.text: Doo shita no, hooroo-sha? Shinpai-soo ni miemasu ne.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P022
Reply.text: Masutaa, uruku no juumin ga anata ni taishite aku o kuwadatete imasu. Anata o machi kara sasoidasu tame ni watashi o okurikonda nodesu!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N032
Reply.text: Uragirimono no keikaku o akiraka ni suru to iu kenmeina koodoo o torimashita! Zehi wagaya ni gesuto to shite kite kudasai!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P042
Reply.text: Watashi wa uragiri ga sukide wa arimasen. Sore ni, anata wa watashi ga hitsuyoo to suru joohoo o motte imasu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N052
Reply.text: Nani o shiritai no ka na?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P062
Reply.text: Watashi wa Orakuru o sagashite iru, sore ga watashi ga koko ni kita yuiitsu no riyuudesu. Watashi no shitsumon ni kotae rareru no wa kare dakedesu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P021
Reply.text: Kikai no kaibutsu ga watashitachi o osotte kimashita! Watashi no yuujin wa kega o shite ugokemasen. Chikaku ni oite kimashita. Herupu!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_N031
Reply.text: Mochiron tetsudaimasu yo, hooroo-sha yo!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_MainDruid_5_P041
Reply.text: Watashi ni shitagatte kudasai.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: Uruku no juumin kara wa nagaiai shirase ga nakatta. Karera ni nani ga okotta no ka o kaimei suru no o tetsudattekudasai!

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P02
Reply.text: Anata mo soko ni itte mimasen ka?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_N03
Reply.text: Subete no monsutaa ga taosa reru wakede wa arimasen. Anata dake ga sonomichi no kiken o subayaku kokufuku dekiru nodesu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P042
Reply.text: Motto juuyoona koto ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_1_P041
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, kaiketsu shite mimasu.

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N01
Reply.text: Kootetsu-juu no gesuto wa watashitachi no tomodachidesu!

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N02
Reply.text: Minasan, dooshita nodesu ka? Naze rinjin o wasureta nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N03
Reply.text: Watashitachi wa moo gooman'na doruido soo no shien o hitsuyoo to shimasen. Watashitachi no chiiki ni sugata o arawasanai yoo ni tsutaete kudasai. Watashitachiha jibun-tachi ga tsuyoi kamigamidearu koto ni kidzukimashita. Sono nikutai wa ishi yori mo tsuyoku, sono ikari wa inazuma yori mo osoroshiidesu.

Reply.name: Uluk_Bar_Customer1_3_N04
Reply.text: Anata no kotoba o karera ni tsutaemasu. Hoka ni nani ga dekirudeshou ka?..

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_N01
Reply.text: Gaikoku hito yo, kiitekudasai. Mura wa shinitsutsu ari, juumin wa kurushinde imasu. Daremoga kurutta wakede wa naku, ooku no hito ga sono yoona henka ni hantai shite imasuga, karera wa kaibutsu no ikari o osorete imasu. Dekiru hito wa zen'in satte shimaimashitaga, karera dakede wa Sesu ni renraku suru koto wa dekimasen. Shitei sa reta basho de o ai shimasu. Onegaidesu, kono hito-tachi o nigasu no o tetsudatte kudasai.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P02
Reply.text: Anata jishin wa doodesu ka?

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_N03
Reply.text: Watashi wa nokorimasu. Taishuu ga kuruma ni muchuuninaru riyuu o tsukitomete, chooroo ni nattoku shite morau hitsuyoo ga aru.

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P042
Reply.text: Anata no nayami ni tsuite watashi ga nani o kinisurudeshou ka? Jibun de shirabete kudasai!

Reply.name: r3m1_NearUluk_Civilian1_1_P041
Reply.text: Watashi ga karera o tasukemasu. Anata ni mo kooun ga otozuremasu yoo ni! Sayoonara.
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('r3m1_RescueUlukCivil'); CreateTeam('RescueCars',1064,CVector(getPos('RescueCiv_loc')),{'r1m1_bug02','DemoMolokovoz1'}); TActivate('trRescArmyPlace'); TActivate('trRescArmyDie'); TActivate('trWentCivCamp'); SetTolerance(1100,1064,RS_ALLY); SetTolerance(1019,1064,RS_ALLY); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount(1); SetVar('BezhenAlive', 0) EndConversation();

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer1_2_N01
Reply.text: Uruku de nani ga okotta no ka?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P022
Reply.text: Chooroo wa atarashii kami o shinjite ori, ima dewa kinzoku no kaibutsu o suuhai shite imasu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_N032
Reply.text: Kanashii oshirasedesu. Tadashi, hooshuu wa kakutoku shimashita. Anshin shite itte kudasai.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P021
Reply.text: Chooroo wa atarashii kami o shinjite ori, ima dewa kinzoku no kaibutsu o suuhai shite imasu. Tadashi, korera no hitobito wa subete o yori yoku oshiete kuremasu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_N031
Reply.text: Anata wa gaikoku hito ni taisuru watashitachi no iken o kaemashita. Uketotte kudasai - kore ga anata no hooshuudesu. Watashitachi no basho o tsuuka shinakereba naranai baai wa, itsu demo watashitachi no tasuke o tayori ni shite kudasai.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Customer2_2_P041
Reply.text: Kochira koso arigatoo. Shizen to kyoosei shite kurashite iru hitobito ga ima mo iru no wa ureshii kotodesu.

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N01
Reply.text: Moo modotte kimashita ne! Orakuru wa anata ni nan to itta nodesu ka? Sabaku o wataru hoohoo o shitte imasu ka?

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N02
Reply.text: Kaitoo yori mo shitsumon no kata ga ookattadesu. Watashitachi wa tadashii michi o susunde imasuga! Orakuru ni teikyoo shita disuku to dooyoo no ta no disuku o doko de mitsuke rareru ka oshietekudasai. Aruiwa, Iwan Guo to shitashikatta jinbutsu no namae o agete kudasai.

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N03
Reply.text: Kono koto ni tsuite nanika o shitte iru no wa, osoraku Ben Dorosseru dakedeshou. Kare wa Middogarudo no chikaku ni sunde imasu. Furui kenkyuusha de Iwan no yuujindearu kare wa, anata o tasukeru gimu ga arimasu.

Reply.name: RazVill_Bar_Lisa_1_N04
Reply.text: Dakara watashitachi wa kare ni awanakereba narimasen. Watashi ni michi o oshiete kudasai.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N01
Reply.text: Mishiranu hito, toorisuginaide kudasai! Son'na hoo no tame ni tokubetsu ofaa o go yooi shimashita!

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N02
Reply.text: Watashi ga anata ni kyoomigaaru to kangaete kudasai. Watashi ni nani o teikyoo shite moraemasu ka?

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N03
Reply.text: Kyoo dake! Chikaku no tochi no chizu! Hobo muryoo!

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N04
Reply.text: Soshite, korega muryoo de ikura kakarimasu ka?

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N05
Reply.text: Koin wa tatta no 50-mai. Kooshoo wa futekisetsudesu.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N06c
Reply.text: Arigatoo, chizu nashi demo nantoka yatte ikemasu.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N06b
Reply.text: Watashi wa koin 30-mai ni dooi shi, tomodachi to shite wakaremasu.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N07b
Reply.text: Ittadeshou, kakaku wa saishuu ketteidesu! 50 koin - nyuusatsu wa arimasen.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N08bb
Reply.text: Oonaa wa shinshidesu. Anata no kusatta shoohin no ta no kaite o sagashite kudasai.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N08ba
Reply.text: Oshaberi, kuso oshaberi. Kore ga 50 koindesu.

Reply.name: RazVill_Razboynik1_1_N06a
Reply.text: Sono chizu wa watashi ni totte yakunitatsudeshou. Torihiki.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N01
Reply.text: Anata ga Orakuru ni mukatte iru to shirimashita.
Reply.scriptCondition: QuestStatus('q_VisitDruid')==Q_CANBEGIVEN and QuestStatus('r3m1_ClearSanctuary_ReturnDruid2')==Q_COMPLETED and not(IsQuestTaken('q_PlaceWithSign')) and GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount( ) == 0

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N02
Reply.text: Tekisetsuna joohoo-gen ga arimasu. Watashi wa hontooni kare no adobaisu o motomete imasu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N03
Reply.text: Sukoshi onegai o shite moraemasu ka?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N04b
Reply.text: Mooshiwakearimasenga, ima wa anata no mondai ni taisho suru jikan ga arimasen.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N04a
Reply.text: Mochiron, doosureba tasuke rarerudeshou ka?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N05a
Reply.text: Watashi no shin'yuu no hitori wa, anata to onajiyooni kotae o sagashi ni ikimashitaga, modotte kimasendeshita. Kare wa Orakuru no ie kara soo tookunai tokoro ni teijuu shita to kiita. Chikaku ni iru baai wa, kare ni ai ni itte nimotsu o watashite kudasai.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N06a
Reply.text: Kare ga seikaku ni dokoni teijuu shita ka shitte imasu ka?

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N07a
Reply.text: Kono basho ni tsuite oshiete moraimashita. Koko, kyuudoo-zoidesu.

Reply.name: Set_Bar_Druid3_1_N08a
Reply.text: Shinpaishinaidekudasai, watashi ga aisatsu shite nimotsu o okurimasu.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N01
Reply.text: Ryokoo-sha-san, anata wa yoi hitodesu ne. Ko no hon o watashitachi no rekishi to tomoni te ni totte mimasen ka.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N02
Reply.text: Tokuni kyoomi naidesu yo!

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N03
Reply.text: Watashi wa zenryoona hito o korosu no wa sukide wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N04
Reply.text: Kooeina koto ni, watashi ni hanashikakete kurete, kono yoona kichoona hon o kurete arigatoo.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N05
Reply.text: Sonokata ga yoidesu. Itte mo ii.

Reply.name: Uluk_Hram_Zrec_1_N06
Reply.text: Arigatoo. Wakare.

Reply.name: Aborigen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Hooi sa reta, akuma yo! Mazu watashi no sakumotsu, sorekara anata mo watashi o tsurete ikitai nodesu ka! Soo kantan ni wa kusshimasen yo!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000549
Reply.text: Kochira koso, konbanwa.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000550
Reply.text: Anata mo sono ichi-ridesu, fiirudo de hibashira no naka ni anata ga iru no o watashi wa mimashita!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001159
Reply.text: Akiraka ni, betsu no mugaina saikoga…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000551
Reply.text: Shinpaishinaidekudasai, zenryoona hito, kagaku no chikara ga anata no hata kara akuma o oidashimasu. Koreha mae ni mo mita koto ga arimasu.

Reply.name: SektantMain_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Yaa, ushinawareta tamashii yo. Anata no nakaniha kuukyo-sa to seishin-sei no ketsujo ga miemasu. Watashitachi no kyookai o tasuketekudasai. Soo sureba anata wa tadashii michi o susumu koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001133
Reply.text: Kore ga hitsuyoo ka doo ka wakarimasen… Gutaitekini wa nani ga hitsuyoodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001247
Reply.text: Watashitachi no mure no reitekina baransu wa, futari no ikyooto no sonzai ni yotte kuzurete imasu. Karera wa itan de shomin no kokoro o konran sa sete iru nodesu! Hitobito o muyoo no shinpai to shinkoo no utagai kara sukuu tame ni, kono ni-ri no itan-sha o koroshite sono kubi o watashi ni motte kite kudasai. Anata wa watashitachi no shukufuku to kandaina hooshuu o ukerudeshou.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001249
Reply.text: Iie, watashi wa anata no shukufuku nashide nantoka ikite ikimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001248
Reply.text: Watashi wa kyookai o tasukeru koto ni dooi shimasu!

Reply.name: SektantMain_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Moo kadai wa kanryoo shimashita ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001252
Reply.text: Mada itan-sha o mitsukeru koto ga dekite inai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001251
Reply.text: Hai, koko ni futari no itan-sha no atama ga arimasu. Karera wa mohaya hitobito no tamashii ni konran o uetsukeru koto wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001250
Reply.text: Kore ga anata no hooshuudesu. Watashitachi no kyookai no nanioite, minasan no saranaru go kooseki o shukufuku shimasu. Anata ni kooun ga otozuremasu yoo ni.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001253
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('r2m2_ReturnHeadsQuest'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_shaman_head1'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_shaman_head2'); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 2 ); AddPlayerMoney( 1000 ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Oi, untenshu! Koko kara tookunai mura ni gomi o sutete moraemasen ka? Anata ga kare ni korera no teppen o wataseba, kare wa anata ni juubun'na hooshuu o haraudeshou. Jibun demo dekimasuga, shigoto ga oo sugimasu. Sanzoku no senjoo ni nokosa reta torofii o nantoka atsumenakereba narimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001259
Reply.text: Anata no torofii o hakobu jikan ga arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001135
Reply.text: Sagyoo ni gomi wa nai yoodesu. Janku o tsumikonde kudasai.

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Soo, kono enjin o motte kite kureta ndesu. Arigatoo. Kore ga anata ga shoojiki ni kakutoku shita koindesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001255
Reply.text: Okane ga aru no wa mochiron yoi kotodesuga, naze kowareta enjin de oofuku unten suru no ka rikai dekimasendeshita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001254
Reply.text: Bijinesuda yo, aiboo. Himitsu dake o hanasu koto wa dekimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001256
Reply.text: Kore ga kurai mondaidearu koto wa akirakadesu.

Reply.name: TrashFarmer_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Matamata anatadesu. Naze kujoo o itta nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001261
Reply.text: Furui enjin o zengo ni yusoo suru imi ga mada wakarimasen. Sono himitsu o akiraka ni shimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001263
Reply.text: Koogakuna hiyoo ga kakarimasu. 2000 koinde iinode, kono joohoo o kyooyuu shimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001260
Reply.text: Sukoshi kooka ni natte kite imasu. Nani mo shitsumon shinakatta koto o kangaete kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001264
Reply.text: Sore wa sono yoona okane no tame no yoi himitsu ni chigai arimasen! Oshiete.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001262
Reply.text: Watashi wa senjoo ni nokotta kuruma kara sadoo buhin o atsume, shuurikoo no yuujin ni okurimasu. Doosa suru buhin o watashi ga okutta buhin to kookan shi tari, shinpin no buhin o okutte kure tari suru koto mo arimasu. Sudeni hoogaina kakaku de hanbai shite imasu. |Subete o shitta ijoo, watashi wa anata o korosanakereba narimasen. Ha-ha-ha, katta yo! Maa, anshin shite kudasai. Tadashi, watashitachi no chiiki de onaji sagi o jikkoo shiyou to shinaide kudasai. Soo shinai to, mondai ga hassei shimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001265
Reply.text: Kashikoi aideadesu ne.

Reply.name: NewMechanik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Soshite machinimatta enjin ga toojoodesu. Kore wa anata no hooshuudesu, mishiranu hito yo.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001137
Reply.text: Kantan'na okane.

Reply.name: NewMechanik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Kono enjin o Marettsu ni mochikaette moraemasu ka? Toozen, muryoode wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001258
Reply.text: Watashi o bakanishiteru no? Tsurete ikanai yo.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001257
Reply.text: Okane o haratte kureru kagiri, nani o shite mo kamawanai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000452
Reply.text: Koko de shigoto o mitsukete, watashi no shitsumon ni kotaete moraeru to iwa remashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000453
Reply.text: Sore ga kanooda. Soshite, anata wa daredesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000454
Reply.text: Watashi wa saikin koko ni kimashita, azuma kara kimashita. Watashi wa anata no riidaa, Akuseru no kooseki ni tsuite yoku kiite kimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000455
Reply.text: Soo soo! Kono hito wa sugoi hitoda yo! Kare ni totte fukanoona koto wa nani mo nai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000456
Reply.text: Kare to chokusetsu akushu o shitaidesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000457
Reply.text: Sorekara wa nani mo umaremasen… Gozonji no toori, kare no shi o nozonde iru jaakuna hitobito ga imasu. Shitagatte, tan'naru ningen ga kare ni au no wa kantande wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000458
Reply.text: Nani o suru ka? Watashi wa isshoo yume o mitekimashita…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000459
Reply.text: Watashi wa fukanoo'de wanaku kantande wanai to itta nodesu! Akuseru wa kojin-teki ni sensoo no eiyuu o hyooshoo shimasu. Watashitachi no nakama ni kuwawari, igyoo o nashitogete kudasai - soo sureba kare to akushu suru koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000460
Reply.text: Dare to tatakatte iru nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000461
Reply.text: Hoppoo no hito-tachi to issho ni. Karera wa watashitachi ni totte kon'nan'na jiki ni watashitachi o uragitta nodesu. Ima, watashitachi no kokoro ni wa awaremi wa nokotte imasen. Akuseru wa watashitachi o han'ei no kyooyuu no jidai ni michibiite ori, watashitachi no mae ni tachihadakaru no wa mijimena rinjin dakedesu. Shikashi, karera ni nokosa reta jikan wa nagaku arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000462
Reply.text: Anata ga dono yoona risoo no tame ni tatakatte iru no ka ga wakarimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000463
Reply.text: Sore de, anata wa watashitachi ni sanseidesu ka, soretomo hantaidesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000465
Reply.text: Mochiron watashi mo isshodesu. Soshite Akuseru ni hayaku au tame ni nanika subarashii koto o shiyou to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000468
Reply.text: Chiisana koto kara hajimemashou. Imanotokoro, watashitachi ni totte mottomo juuyoona koto wa, isshun tari tomo teki ni ki o yurume sasenai kotodesu. Kokkyoo ni iki, ugoku mono subete o koogeki shite kudasai. Anata ga ryakudatsu shita mono wa anata no monodesu. Watashitachiha musen de renraku o toriatte imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000469
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('SNGPROVIANT'); CompleteQuest('d_FindVerbInAR_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands2_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands1_Quest'); AddHistory( 'r2_AR_00' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000464
Reply.text: Moshika shitara betsu no hoohoo ga mitsukaru kamo shiremasen…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000466
Reply.text: Mochiron, sore wa anata shidaidesu. Watashitachi no hitobito dake ga tanjundesu - karera wa fuhitsuyoona hanashi de ijime rareru koto o konomimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000467
Reply.text: Rikai suru. Kinoo umareta wakede wa arimasen.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Sore de, anata wa Hiiro no Yoake to iu taigi no tame ni inochi o sasageru kakugo wa dekite imasu ka?

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Sakusen wa juubun ijoo ni seikoo shita. Anata ga teki no chuui o sorashite iru ma ni, watashitachiha juuyoona senryaku-teki shisetsu o senryoo suru koto ga dekimashita. Senri-hin no wakemae o te ni iremashou.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000473
Reply.text: Ato de sarani muzukashiku narimasu. Tsugini, teki no sensen no haigo ni shin'nyuu shi, teki kara hokyuu o ubau hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Kore o okonau ni wa, shokuryoo to hitsuju-hin de kootsuukikan o bakuha suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Itsumo no yoo ni, toreru mono wa subete anata no monodesu. Yare!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000474
Reply.text: Kon'nan wa kowakunai!

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Anata wa hokubu no keizai ni dageki o ataeru koto ni seikoo shimashita. Nokori wa watashitachi no shigotodesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000476
Reply.text: Akuseru ni aeru no wa itsudesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000477
Reply.text: Anata wa takai mokuhyoo o kakagete imasu. Dooyoo ni hooshi o tsudzukete kudasai. Soo sureba, kare wa kojin-teki ni anata ni hooshuu o sashiagemasu.|Watashitachi no yoki yuujindearu shuudoo-shi-tachi ga anata ni kyoomi o motte imasu. Karera wa watashitachi ni hakarishirenai saabisu o teikyoo shi, inori de heishi-tachi no shiki o sasaete kuremasu… soshite subarashii waindesu! Shuudooin ni iki, nomimono no betsu no batchi no kyookyuu ni tsuite kooshoo shimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000478
Reply.text: Nan to iu orokana shigotodeshou ka? Sekaijuu de sensoo ga okotte iru jidai ni…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000479
Reply.text: Shinkoo no chikara o kashoo hyooka shinaide kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000480
Reply.text: Watashi wa shitagaimasu!

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg4
Reply.text: Osoidesu. Wain o motte kimashita ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000502
Reply.text: Hai. Kuruma no naka ni taru.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000504
Reply.text: Daijoobu. Nani mo iu hitsuyoo wa arimasen. Watakushijishin, kono sooryo-tachi no koto o osorete imasu… Sate, hondai ni modorimasuga, watashitachi no naka ni uragirimono ga iru koto o shitte imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000505
Reply.text: Kore wa daredesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000506
Reply.text: Han seifu seiryoku wa seiken ni fuman o daite ita. Karera wa watashitachi no keizai o naibu kara hakai shite imasu. Choodo mushi ga ki no kawa o kuiarashi, yukkuri to ki o koroshite iku no to onajiyooni, korera no gaichuu wa watashitachi no chikara o yowameru kanoosei ga arimasu. Watashitachi wa karera no kyanpu ga doko ni aru no ka o shirimashita. Hanran-gun wa koogeki o yoki shite inai tame, kantan ni taisho dekimasu. Anata no ninmu wa karera o zen'in korosu kotodesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000507
Reply.text: Buki o motanai hito o korosu… kyohi shitara doo naru?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000508
Reply.text: Soo sureba, watashitachi no naka ni moohitori uragirimono ga iru koto ga wakarimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000509
Reply.text: Chuumon o jikkoo sa sete itadakimasu.

Reply.name: RecruiterInAR_hellodlg5
Reply.text: Kooshoo no kekka wa doo naru nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000526
Reply.text: Difendaa no riidaa-tachi wa koko de watashi to au koto ni dooi shita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000527
Reply.text: Subete ga kantan ni susumi sugita. Teki wa kookatsunanode, koreha wana ni naru kanoosei ga arimasu. Izure ni seyo, watashitachi wa soko ni itte karera to tatakau tsumoridesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000528
Reply.text: Un'ei ni sanka shitai!

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, musukodesu. Saikin, anata wa watashitachi no kyootsuu no taigi no na no shita ni ooku no kagayakashii kooi o okonaimashitaga, soreha watashitachi no chuumoku o nogaremasendeshita. Watashitachi wa anata no koto o motto yoku shiru koto ni shimashita.
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken('r2m2_FindROMinCastle') and not(IsQuestComplete('r2m2_FindROMinCastle')) and IsQuestComplete('d_SinFather_Quest') and not(IsQuestTaken('r2m2_FightFelix')) and not(IsQuestComplete('r2m2_FightFelix'))

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000482
Reply.text: Nani o itte iru no ka yoku wakarimasen…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000483
Reply.text: Michinimayotta ryokoo-sha ga watashitachi no tokoro ni yattekite, anata no koto o yoku shitte iru to itta…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000484
Reply.text: Kore wa daredesu ka? Nani o itte iru no ka wakarimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000485
Reply.text: Soshite sekaijuu no toozoku o minagoroshi ni suru koto o chikatta to…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000486
Reply.text: Watashi? Uso! Watashi wa… Sanzoku ga daisukidesu, watakushijishin mo sanzokudesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000487
Reply.text: Watashi wa anata o shinjimasu, musuko yo. Shikashi, sono yoona hinan wa hijoo ni shinkokudeari, watashitachi wa anata-tachi no dochira ga tadashii no ka o akiraka ni suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Kami ga anata o sabaka remasu yoo ni… toogi-ba de no shitoo ni oite! Ikinokotta mono ga tadashii.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000490
Reply.text: Shikashi, watashi no aite wa daredesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000491
Reply.text: Ferikkusu jiisan.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000492
Reply.text: Nani? Ferikkusu?!

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, musukodesu. Saikin, anata wa watashitachi no kyootsuu no taigi no na no shita ni ooku no kagayakashii kooi o okonaimashitaga, soreha watashitachi no chuumoku o nogaremasendeshita. Watashitachi wa anata no koto o motto yoku shiru koto ni shimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000489
Reply.text: Watashi wa nani mo kakushimasen. Nani demo kiite kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000493
Reply.text: Shitsumon wa hitsuyoo arimasen. Hitome mita dakede juubun ni rikai dekimasu. Watashitachiha juujigun ni sanka suru hito zen'in o seisa shimasu. Dakarakoso, watashitachiha haiboku o shirimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000494
Reply.text: Dewa, watashi wa doodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000495
Reply.text: Watashitachiha, anata ga ookina henka o motarashi-yoo to shite iru node wanai ka to iu ginen o daite imasu. Ima sugu anata o korosou to suru hito mo imasu. Demo, ikirubekida to omou yo.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000496
Reply.text: Mochiron arigatoogozaimasu… Shikashi, naze kono ketsudan o shita nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000497
Reply.text: Watashitachi no shimei wa, kono chiiki ni okeru kenryoku toosoo o haruka ni koete imasu. Anata to onajiyooni. Anshin shite itte kudasai. Soshite wain mo wasurenaide kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000498
Reply.text: Kyooshinjade wanaku hitobito to kakawaru no wa subarashii kotodesu.

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Anata wa jibun no shuchoo o shoomei shimashita. Modotte mo kamaimasen ga, wain o wasurenaide kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000500
Reply.text: Hai, mochirondesu… Wain o nomi ni kimashita…

Reply.name: Monah_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Kami no koe ga anata o watashitachi no shuudooin ni tsurete kimashita.

Reply.name: Mopl_he
Reply.text: Risa ga iru no wa shitte imasu yo! Sore o watashi ni watashi nasai, samonakereba anata no shuudooin o jigoku ni hikisaite shimaimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000538
Reply.text: Watashitachi wa anata no tekide wa arimasen. oogoe de watashitachi o komara senaide kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000539
Reply.text: Akuseru no haiboku ni yori, anata no chikara wa owarimashita. Watashidenakereba, hokanohito ga kono basho o yakiharaudeshou. 3tsu kazoete koogeki o kaishi shimasu. Wantsuu…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000540
Reply.text: Kokoro o harashite kudasai, shoonen! Furimuku to, kanojo ga kono shuudooin no kabe kara isoide hanarete iku no ga miemasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000541
Reply.text: Kuso no tame ni!

Reply.name: LagerGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Mishiranu hito, anatahadaredesu ka, soshite nani ga shitai nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000511
Reply.text: Akuseru no uragirimono wa watashi ga shokei shite yaru!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000512
Reply.text: Watashitachiha darenimo kigai o kuwaetaku arimasen! Watashitachi wa tadashii koto no tame ni tatakatte imasu. Doo ka go jihi o! Wagaya ni wa mada kazoku ga imasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000514
Reply.text: Watashi wa satsujin-shade wa arimasen, sore ga jinseina nodesu… Teokure ni naru mae ni nigete kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000515
Reply.text: Arigatoo! Watashitachiha riburiumu e mukete shuppatsu shimasuga, Dokuritsu Toshi Rengoo no keiei-jin ni kinkyuu ni tensoo suruhitsuyoogaaru kichoona joohoo ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000516
Reply.text: Hiiro no Yoake ni watashi no ibasho wa moo nai. Watashi mo ima tooboo-shadesu. Suwatte kudasai, watashi ga tsurete ikimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000513
Reply.text: Hiiro no Yoake no na no moto ni shine!

Reply.name: LagerGuardian_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Watashi wa hanran-gun no riidaada! Watashi o mukae ni kimashita ka?

Reply.name: Lag_hlg08871
Reply.text: Herubetia ni tsurete ikanakereba narimasen. Soshite, hontooni juuyoona koto o shitte okubekidesu.

Reply.name: Agent_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Yoru wa nagai…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000520
Reply.text: Shikashi, yoake wa chikadzuite imasu. Watashitachi wa jiyuu toshi ni taisuru kongo no sakusen ni kansuru juuyoona joohoo o motte imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000521
Reply.text: Go teikyoo itadaita joohoo to hikikae ni, yorokonde otetsudai sa sete itadakimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000522
Reply.text: Kono joohoo wa juuyoo sugiru tame, tan'naru eejento ni makaseru koto wa dekimasen. Mawari ni wa uragirimono ga imasu. Watashi ga shinrai dekiru no wa mottomo juuyoona hitobito dakedesu. Watashi ga shitte iru koto ga sensoo no shoohai o kimerudarou!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000523
Reply.text: Watashitachi mo dooyoo no kekka o yosoo shite imashita. Watashitachi no riidaa ga kono basho de anata o matteimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000524
