Reply.text: Sugu ni soko ni toochaku shimasu.

Reply.name: Agent_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Anata no koto wa oboete imasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000542
Reply.text: Yoru wa nagai…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000543
Reply.text: Shikashi, yoake wa chikadzuite imasu. Kon'nichiwa, dooshi!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000544
Reply.text: Kyooryoku no keikaku ni tsuite hanashiau tame ni kimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000546
Reply.text: Kitekurete arigatoo. Shikashi, koko wa anzende wa arimasen. 5-Bu-go ni kono basho de shuugoodesu. Sokode watashitachi no riidaa ga anata no subete no shitsumon ni kotaemasu. Kooun o!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000547
Reply.text: Bookun wa taosa rerudarou.

Reply.name: Axel_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Watashi wa Akuseru. Watashi o sagashite iru to kiita nodesuga?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000533
Reply.text: Yatto tadoritsuita yo, Akuseru, kantande wa nakattakedo ne!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000534
Reply.text: Anata no nebaridzuyo-sa wa shoosan ni ataishimasuga, zan'nen'nagara, anata wa watashitachi no kaigi o ikinokoru koto wa dekinaideshou. Anata ga karera ga iu hodo tsuyokute binshoodearu ka doo ka o kakunin shitai nodesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000535
Reply.text: Watashi no mokuhyoo o tassei suru tame ni, watashi wa kono shiken ni gookaku suru junbi ga dekite imasu.
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'r2m2_MoveToZeonToAlex' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_GetAkselBandit_Quest' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_FindAksel_Quest' ); TakeQuest( 'r2m2_FightWithAxelInArena_Quest' ); TActivate('AXELARENA'); EndConversation(); LeaveTown()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000530
Reply.text: Yatto kimi no me o massugu ni miru koto ga dekiru yo, Akuseru. Jissai, watashi ni hitsuyoona no wa tada hitotsu, anata no inochidesu. Kettoo o idomimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000531
Reply.text: Choosen o ukeiremasu! Koroshitaku wa nainoni. Ariina e, kyoodai-tachi. Dare ga yori eikoo ni ataisuru no ka o mitsukemashou! Sokode omachishiteimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000532
Reply.text: Ariina e!
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'r2m2_MoveToZeonToAlex' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_GetAkselBandit_Quest' ); CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_FindAksel_Quest' ); TakeQuest( 'r2m2_FightWithAxelInArena_Quest' ); TActivate('AXELARENA'); EndConversation(); LeaveTown()

Reply.name: Estet_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Okane o kasegitakunaidesu ka? Anata no sukiru o katsuyoo dekimasu yo.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001110
Reply.text: Shigoto to wa nanidesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001119
Reply.text: Suujitsumae, watashinoie de gootoo ga arimashita. Doroboo wa watashi kara totemo kichoona mono o nusumimashita. Jijitsu wa, kore wa hijoo ni tokushuna obujekuto, tsumari sekai geijutsu no kessakudearu to iu kotodesu. Ko no yoona hanzai o okasu koto ga dekiru no wa, kodai no shin no aikoo-ka dakedesu. Soshite, watashi igai ni sono yoona hito o hitoridake shitte imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001121
Reply.text: Hataraki sugi. Jibun de shirabete kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001120
Reply.text: Kono yaroo ni kyookun o oshienakereba narimasen.

Reply.name: Estet_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Aa, anata wa sekai no geijutsu no kessaku o watashi ni motte kite kuremashita! Sore o watashi ni watashite, okane o uketotte kudasai…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001122
Reply.text: Moshika shitara, kono kessaku o motto yoi basho ni oku koto ga dekiru kamo shirenai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001116
Reply.text: Utsukushi-sa o tamochimashou.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001111
Reply.text: Sugu ni oshietekudasai, anata wa esuteeto kara sekai no geijutsu no kessaku o nusunda nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001124
Reply.text: Hai, demo… mooshiwakearimasenga, motte orimasen. Saikin, aru akutoo ga watashi ni chikadzuki, kessaku o nusumou to mooshidete kimashita. Watashitachiha issho ni esuteeto ni iku hoohoo ni tsuite keikaku o tatemashita. Watashi wa kare ni maebarai o shiharaimashitaga, sono otoko to wa nidoto au koto wa arimasendeshita. Hanzai-sha to kakawatte shimatta koto o hontooni kookai shite imasu. Demo, watashi wa hontooni sono yoona utsukushi-sa o teniireta katta… Osoraku anata wa watashitachi futari o damashita hito o mitsukeru koto ga dekirudeshou. Kare wa jibun jishin o roogu to yobimashita. Watashi wa chikaku no chiisana keikoku de kare ni aimashita. Osoraku kare wa mada soko ni irudeshou.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001125
Reply.text: Anshin shite kudasai, watashi ga kare o mitsukemasu. Soshite, moshi anata ga uso o tsuitanara, watashi wa anata no tame ni modotte kimasu.

Reply.name: AntipodEstet_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Sekai no geijutsu no kessaku wa arimasu ka? Koko ni agete kudasai! Mushiro, shikkari to kansha sa sete itadakimasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001123
Reply.text: Iie, imanotokoro-ka ni oite okimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001118
Reply.text: Hai kochiradegozaimasu. Doozo.

Reply.name: Gulik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Watashi no joohoo-kin ni yoru to, yutakana yusoo-sen wa hotondo muboobi ni minami e susumudarou to iu. Sono ten wa shinjitsudesu. Hinto wa wakarimashita, senri-hin no hanbun wa anata ni moraemasu. Kite imasu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001126
Reply.text: Senri-hin o motte koko de matteimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001128
Reply.text: Watashi wa sugu ni modotte kimasu.

Reply.name: Gulik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Nanto iu seikoodeshou! Kono seihin o buji ni todokeru koto ga dekireba, watashi wa… Nokori no jinsei ga atae rarerudeshou! Mattekudasai… Kuso, koko ni wa Big Boss no maaku ga hyooji sa rete imasu - dare mo watashitachi kara kono seihin o koonyuu shimasen! Bosu kara nusunda mono wa nagaku iki raremasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001129
Reply.text: Shoohin o jibun de uketotte kudasai. Soo sureba pasu shimasu. Mendoona koto wa hitsuyoo arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001112
Reply.text: Taikin no nioi ga suru. Kono jooshi wa don'na jooshidesu ka? Kare ga toonan no koto o shiru mae ni, watashitachi wa kare no tokoro ni ikanakereba narimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001130
Reply.text: Kare wa yama no choojoo ni aru nankoofuraku no yoosai ni sunde iru to iwa rete imasu. Watashi ga buppin o kakushite anchisukiru o obikidashi, anata wa-chuu ni haitte bosu ni taisho shimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001131
Reply.text: Watashi ga yarimasu.

Reply.name: SelCitizen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Nani ga hoshiidesu ka, kaihoo-sha?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000448
Reply.text: Kitsune wa koko ni imashita ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000449
Reply.text: Kashikomarimashita. Kanojo wa ooisogi de heruvu~etia ni mukatta.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000450
Reply.text: Moo kanojo wa watashi kara hanaremasen!

Reply.name: SelCitizen_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Watashi wa soshiki-joo no juuyoona mondai de isogashiidesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000642
Reply.text: Watashi no yooji wa kyuumuna nodesu. Hatsudenjo o teishi shinakereba narimasen! Jinrui no unmei wa anata ni kakatte imasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000648
Reply.text: Nani o motomete iru ka rikai shite imasu ka? Kono hatsudenjo wa ikutsu ka no toshi ni denryoku o kyookyuu shite imasu. Watashi wa, toppina aidea no tame ni hitobito o netsu to hikari nashi de hoochi suru tsumori wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000649
Reply.text: Anata no suteeshon mo gaikoku no shinryaku-sha no kichi ni esa o ataete iru koto ni kidzuite imasu ka?!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000643
Reply.text: Nani o itte iru no ka wakarimasen. Shikashi, saikin, enerugii-more no jiken ga hinpan ni hassei shite imasu… Shikashi, kore wa watashi no ketsudan o kaeru koto wa arimasen!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000645
Reply.text: Jinsei de ichidodake, jibun no jinsei ni sekininwomotte kudasai. Eki ni suu-funkan teisha suru dakedesu. Sekai no unmei wa anata no ketsudan ni kakatte imasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000647
Reply.text: Doo soozoo shimasu ka? Suu-funkan… Kinkyuu shattodaun ni yori, suteeshon wa sukunakutomo 1-nichi shattodaun sa remasu. Shikashi… yoboo shuuri no jiki wa chikadzuite imasu. Chiisana midori no dansei o sagashi ni ikimashou.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000651
Reply.text: Anata wa sekai ni kichoona kooken o shite kuremashita!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000644
Reply.text: Kore wa, watashi ga kono orokamono no kakurega o jigoku ni hikisakanakereba naranai koto o imi shimasu. Dewa, Hiiro no Yoake no hito-tachi ni denwa shite mimasu. Karera wa amarini mo nagaiai shigoto o shite inainode…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000646
Reply.text: Ochitsuke, aiboo. Anata wa sensoo no eiyuudesu, anata wa seishin-tekina torauma o kakaete imasu, watashi wa anata o tasukemasu. Sore wa soodesu, denki ga arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000650
Reply.text: Kyoo wa watashi ga yasashikute kooundesu. Narushisutona baka ga sekai o sukuu jama o suru no wa hontooni haradatashii.

Reply.name: SelCitizen_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Kondo wa nani ga hitsuyoodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000656
Reply.text: Saikin nani ka ijoona genshoo ni kidzukimashita ka? Soretomo hen'nahito-tachi?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000657
Reply.text: Chikaku ni ijoo chitai ga aru to iu uwasa ga aru… to iu koto de, chikaku ni wa hen'na yatsura ga takusan iru. Sora ni kinzoku koozoo-mono o mita to iu hito mo imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000658
Reply.text: Kanarazu soko ni tootatsu suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Hinto o arigatoo.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001268
Reply.text: Mata eki ni mondai hassei! Deteike! Anata shidaide wa arimasen!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001269
Reply.text: Wakatta, wakatta.

Reply.name: SelBarmen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Koko de anata ni atta no wa hajimetedesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz471
Reply.text: Anata no tokoro o otozureru no wa hajimetedesu. Koko ni iku ni wa yama o koenakereba narimasendeshita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz472
Reply.text: Ton'neru o toorinukeru koto ga dekitanara, sore wa anata ga tatakai ni oite kachi ga aru koto o imi shimasu. Soretomo yoohei ni naru koto o ketsui shi, saiyoo tantoosha to no gooi ni motodzuite kita nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz473
Reply.text: Osoraku saisho no monodesu. Watashi wa kono kuni ni tsuite hotondo chishiki ga arimasenshi, funsoo ni makikoma retaku arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz474
Reply.text: Kiseki! Sentoo-in wa okane no tame ni hito o korosu tame ni watashitachi no tochi o kayotte kuru wakede wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz475
Reply.text: Ikite, ikashite kudasai, sore ga watashi ga oshie rareta kotodesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz476
Reply.text: Shikashi, dochira-gawa o sentaku suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Kokode wa anata wa yuujin ka teki no dochira kadeari, dai san no sentakushi wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz477
Reply.text: Izure ni seyo, dochira no soba ni tsuku ka o sentaku suru mae ni, koko de no sensoo o rikai suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz478
Reply.text: Kiitekudasai, senshi yo, jaakuna shinryaku-sha to notatakai ni sanka shite kudasai. Watashitachi no taigi wa tadashiidesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz479
Reply.text: Anata no kotoba wa ukeire raremasen. Watashi wa hakkiri to iimashita. Mazu mawari o mimawasu hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz480
Reply.text: Touzu ni itte kudasai. Sokode karera wa shinryaku-sha ni tsuite shirubeki koto o subete oshiete kurerudeshou. Soshite, karera wa anata no kensaku ni yakudachimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz481
Reply.text: Anata no kotoba ni tsuite kangaete mimasu.

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Watashitachi no guntai ni sanka suru junbi wa dekite imasu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz483
Reply.text: Sensoo wa nani no tame ni aru no ka oshietekudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz484
Reply.text: Zen to seiginotameni, jaakuna kemono, shinryaku-sha ni taishite!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz485
Reply.text: Kore wa doko ka de kiita koto ga arimasu. Hoka no basho de kotae o sagashi ni ikimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz486
Reply.text: Matte. Kono panfuretto o yonde mite kudasai. Osoraku kono kuni no rekishi o manabeba, tsugini nani o subeki ka ga anata no kokoro ga oshietekurerudeshou.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz487
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, himana toki ni mite mimashou. …Panfuretto ni kaka rete iru koto wa hontooni hidoidesu. Shikashi, soreto nani o shinakereba naranai nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz488
Reply.text: Teki o gekitai dekiru arayuru jinzai ga hitsuyoodesu. Jookyoo wa hijoo ni kibishii to iwazaru o emasen. Go kyooryoku ni kansha itashimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz489
Reply.text: Sotchoku ni itte, watashi wa Akuseru to kichinto hanashi o suru tame ni anata no chiiki ni kita nodesuga, kono ten de watashitachi no rigai wa itchi shimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz490
Reply.text: Watashitachi no guntai ni sanka shite kudasai! Isshonara motto chansu ga aru yo. Mata, sonomama kare ni chikadzuku koto wa hotondo fukanoodesu. Watashitachi wa kare o korosu tame ni asashin o okurimashitaga, dare mo seikoo shimasendeshita..

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz491
Reply.text: Naze? Nani ga karera o tometa nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz492
Reply.text: Akuseru wa tsuneni genjuuna keibi no moto de idoo shite iru to iu jijitsu ni kuwaete, kare to watashitachi no ma ni wa juu busoo shita kyooaku-han ga hishimeku tekikoku ga sonzai suru nodarou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz493
Reply.text: Hai, soreigai wa.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz494
Reply.text: Kare no kakurega ga doko ni aru no ka seikaku ni wa dare mo shirimasen. Chika kichi o den'enmiyakoshi ni kaeta to iwa rete iruga, imanotokoro seikakuna ichi wa hanmei shite inai. Kurikaeshimasuga, watashi wa mada seikoo shite imasen. Sorede, anata mo watashitachi to isshodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz496
Reply.text: Chikara o awasete Akuseru no ooboo o uchikudakou!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz499
Reply.text: Arigatoo, gaikoku-jin-san. Anshin shite kudasai, anata no kooi wa wasure raremasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz500
Reply.text: Itsu saabisu o kaishi shimasu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz501
Reply.text: Sugu ni. Kokkyoo o patorooru shite kudasai. Teki no teisatsu-hei wa hitori mo wagakuni no ryoodo ni shin'nyuu shite wa narimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz502
Reply.text: Sugu ni shuppatsu shimasu!
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TakeQuest('d_FindVerbInSNG_Quest'); CompleteQuest('d_FindVerbInSNG_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands2_Quest'); CompleteQuestIfTaken('d_GetSupportOneOfTheBands1_Quest'); TActivate ('SERCHSIDELINE'); AddHistory( 'r2_SNG_00' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); SetTolerance( 1100, 1016, RS_ALLY ); SetTolerance( 1100, 1015, RS_ENEMY ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz495
Reply.text: Watashi ga kangaenakereba narimasen…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz497
Reply.text: Mochiron, jimoto no hito to chigatte, itsu demo jiyuu ni gaishutsu dekimasuga…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz498
Reply.text: Doojoo o oshitsukenaide kudasai. Watashi wa kata no ue ni jibun no atama o kakaete imasu.

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Watashitachi no nakama ni kuwawaru junbi wa dekite imasu ka?

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Hitobito wa anata ni jibun no inochi o otte iru nodesu! Anata wa hontooni osorewoshiranu senshidesu. Anata o sugu ni hontoo no ninmu ni haken shinakatta no wa zan'nendesuga, anata no nooryoku o kakunin suru tame ni tesuto suru hitsuyoo ga arimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz504
Reply.text: Moo o wakaridesu ne. Akuseru ni tootatsu suru tamenara nani demo suru junbi ga dekite iru.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz505
Reply.text: Yoi shigoto o tsudzukete kudasai, soo sureba kono chansu ga e raremasu. Sore made no ma, ippan no hitobito ga anata no hogo o hitsuyoo to shite imasu. Kono kuni de no seikatsu o iji suru ni wa, toshi ya mura ni jindoo enjo o tokidoki okuru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Anata no ninmu wa kootsuukikan o mamoru kotodesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz506
Reply.text: Watashi wa sudeni kono tane no shigoto o hikiukenakereba narimasendeshita. Pai no yoo ni kantandesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz507
Reply.text: Rirakkusu shinaide kudasai! Teki wa watashitachi ni mottomo hitsuyoona mono o mota senai yoo ni arayuru doryoku o surudeshou. Shikashi, anata mo hitoride wa arimasen. Kooun o.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz508
Reply.text: Daijoobudesu, shinpaishinaidekudasai!

Reply.name: TuzVerb_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Minasama no okage de, moo shibaraku mochikotae raremasu. Danko to shita taioo no toki ga chikadzuite imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz510
Reply.text: Mochiron yoi koto o suru no wa sukidesuga, ichiban no mokuteki o wasurenaide kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz511
Reply.text: Watashitachi no teki wa yama no mukoo kara shien o ukete imasu. Saishuutekini ton'neru o fuusa dekireba, teki ni juudaina songai o ataeru koto ni narudeshou.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz512
Reply.text: Naze kore ga mada okonawa rete inai nodeshou ka? Kekkyokunotokoro, ton'neru wa anata no ryoodo-nai ni aru nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz513
Reply.text: Shinjite kudasai, watashitachi ni wa yori yuusen jun'i no takai ninmu ga arimashita. Sensoo wa buki dake de okonawa reru wakede wa arimasen. Kondo wa kono doomyaku o burokku shimasu. Wasurenaide kudasai, ton'neru wa seiei no heishi ni yotte mamora rete imasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz514
Reply.text: Karera wa dorehodo eriitona nodeshou ka? Watashi wa sonoochi no hitori o kettoo de kantan ni taoshimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz515
Reply.text: Kore ga karera no ranku o hojuu suru hoohoodesu. Osoraku karera wa anata ga dorehodo tafuna senshidearu ka o tsutae, karera no ichiin ni naru koto o mooshideta nodeshou?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz516
Reply.text: Hai… Sonotoorideshita… Sorera wa anata ga omotte iru hodo tanjunde wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz517
Reply.text: Zan'nen'nagara, wareware wa sakusen o shien suru tame no guntai o teikyoo suru koto ga dekimasen. Anata wa hitori de koodoo suru koto ni narimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz518
Reply.text: Hajimetede wa arimasen. Medaru o totte kudasai!

Reply.name: Senat_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Watashitachi no kyootsuu no teki to notatakai ni okeru anata no seikoo wa chuumoku sa remasendeshita. Anata no seikoo shita koodoo ni yori, anata wa sanzoku no sensoo keikaku o boogai shimashita. Sensoo no nagare o wareware ni yuuri ni kaeru koto ga dekiru ninmu o anata ni takusu toki ga kimashita!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000433
Reply.text: Watashitachi no supai wa, teki jin'ei de bookun ni taisuru fuman ga takamatte iru to hookoku shita. Anata no ninmu wa, hanran-gun to renraku o tori, teki no boogyo no jakuten ni tsuite dekiru kagiri no koto o mitsukeru kotodesu. Watashitachi wa kono tame ni nagaiai junbi o shite kimashita. Watashitachi o shitsuboo sa senaide kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000434
Reply.text: Watashi wa subete o tadashiku yarimasu! Hanran-gun o doo yatte mitsukereba iideshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000435
Reply.text: Tosukaana no baa de karera no renrakusen ni ai ni ikimasu. Pasuwaado: 'Yoru wa nagai', rebyuu: 'Shikashi yoake wa chikai'.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000436
Reply.text: Watashi wa omoidashita. Teki wa tooranai!

Reply.name: Senat_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Anata ga sukutta hangyaku-sha wa, hijoo ni juuyoona joohoo o watashitachi ni teikyoo shite kuremashita. Akuseru no shoogun no hitori ga chiisana goei to tomoni kono chiten o tsuuka suru koto ni naru. Kare o ikedori ni suru koto de, teki ni kansuru kichoona joohoo-gen o eru koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000438
Reply.text: Kare wa tsukamarudarou. Shikashi, kono sakusen ni wa ookibona gunji-ryoku ga hitsuyoo to naru.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000439
Reply.text: Watashitachi wa kore o yoken shite imashita. Danmaku sharyoo to gunji soobi wa sudeni machibuse genba ni idoo shite imashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000440
Reply.text: Shiryobukai hitobito to issho ni hataraku no wa subarashii kotodesu. Watashi wa anata o shitsuboo sa semasen.

Reply.name: Senat_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Hontooni, gaikoku hito yo, anata wa watashitachi ni kooun o motarashite kuremashita. Shoogun wa, teki no boogyo o ukai shite Akuseru jishin ni tootatsu suru hoohoo o watashitachi ni akiraka ni shita dakedenaku, chika toshi e no ichi joohoo to akusesukoodo mo oshiete kuremashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000442
Reply.text: Doo yatte kare ni ko no koto o hanashite moratta no ka, kangaetaku mo arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000443
Reply.text: Soshite sore wa hitsuyoo arimasen. Sorede, watashitachiha teki no chuui o sorashi, anata wa himitsu toshi ni shin'nyuu shite Akuseru o koroshimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000444
Reply.text: Kore ga watashi ga koko ni kita riyuudesu. Doko ni iku no ka oshietekudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000445
Reply.text: Anata no chizu ni anzen'na michi o kakimasu. Juuyoona no wa jibun jishin o akiraka ni shinai kotodearu koto o wasurenaide kudasai. Soosa kaishi no aizu-go wa, musen o chinmoku sa sete kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000446
Reply.text: Shoori ni mukete zenshin shimashou!

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N03
Reply.text: Sate, watashi ga Hoomaa to shimashou. Jaa nani?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N05
Reply.text: Watashi wa sore ga sukidesu! Ittai nani o shiritai nodesu ka!

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N07
Reply.text: Juuyoona no wa, dare mo mitsuke rarenakatta to iu kotode wa naku, ikite soko kara deru no ga muzukashii to iu kotodesu. Soshite, sono yoona kooya ni ashi o fumiireru hito wa hotondo imasen. Son'nani kyoomi ga aru no wa watashi dakedesu.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N09
Reply.text: Isogu hitsuyoo wa arimasen. Tsumari, nishi no shitchi no haigo ni wa kyookoku no nettowaaku ga arimasu. Maigo ni naranakereba sugu ni kaigan ni demasu. Soshite, soko ni koogeki ga matte imasu. Kemuri o haki, ha o narashinagara, bukimina kyodaina kyozoo, sore dakedesu. Karoojite nigeru koto ga dekimashitaga, soreha tada yoru ni soko ni itakaradeshita. Kore ga monogataridesu.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N11
Reply.text: Anata wa watashi o okora sete imasu, bosu. Daiichi ni, koreha subete shinjitsudeari, daini ni, sono yoona kakashi wa tada tabakowosuu dakede wa naku, sokode nanika o mamotte imasu. Daisan ni, moo 1-tsu pointo ga arimasu. Anata no torakku ga numachi o tsuuka dekiru basho o shitte iru no wa watashi dakedesu.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_N13
Reply.text: Watashi wa yoi kokoro o motte imasu. Tokuni suu-pai nonda nochi wa soodesu. Koko ni wa kareta ki ga ari, sono mamukai ni asai basho ga arimasu. Tada kiwotsukete kudasai.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P02
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa! Hoomaa o doko de mitsuke rareru ka oshiete moraemasu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P04
Reply.text: Sorenara o sake o nomasete, anata no yuumeina hanashi o hitotsu kiite ageru yo.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P06
Reply.text: Baatendaa! Tomodachi no tame ni motto tsuyoi mono o sosoide kudasai. Sorede, Hoomaa, anata ga otozureta, dare mo mitsukeru koto ga dekinakatta shinpi-tekina basho ni tsuite oshietekudasai.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P08
Reply.text: Hondai ni hairimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P10
Reply.text: Nanto iu nansensu. Soshite, kono orokana hanashi no tame ni watashi wa nan-kiro mo tabi shita nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P12
Reply.text: Kan shaku o okoshite shimatta koto o yurushitekudasai. Saikin, watashi no seikatsu wa hijoo ni kinchoo shite imasu. Anata no monsutaa ga nani o mamotte iru ka kakunin suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Oshietekudasai, numachi o tooru michi wa dokodesu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4Random_Bar_Gomer1_P14
Reply.text: Arigatoo, shinsetsuna hito.
Reply.scriptResult: if CanQuestBeGiven('r1m4_OvercomeMirras') then TakeQuest('r1m4_OvercomeMirras') end; CompleteQuest('FindGomerA_Quest1'); CompleteQuest('r1m3_FindVrata_KnowPlace'); SetCoordinateForQuest( 'd_FindOracul_Quest' , CVector(getPos('ToR3M1'))) EndConversation()

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_1_N01
Reply.text: Koko de atarashii kao ni aeru no wa mainichide wa arimasen.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_N01
Reply.text: Watashi no hontoonohanashi o kiite mimasen ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_N03
Reply.text: Nodo o nurasu mono ga aru to kaiwa ga sumuuzu ni narimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_N05
Reply.text: [Nomimono: Guruguru] U fufufu… Haa… Kaigan ni kareki ga aru node, sono mukaigawa ni asai basho ga arimasu. Soko ni kuruma de iku koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_P02
Reply.text: Numa no mukoo-gawa ni ikitaidesu. Doko de watareru ka shitte imasu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_P04
Reply.text: Baatendaa! Tomodachi no tame ni motto tsuyoi mono o sosoide kudasai. Sorede, Hoomaa, doo yatte numachi o toorinukeru koto ga dekimasu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Gomer_2_P06
Reply.text: Arigatoo. Baatendaa, kurikaeshimasu!

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: Moohitotsu todokimashita.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: Sore wa anata ni tottemo onajidesu. Soshite umi wa soreto nani no kankei ga aru nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: Ochitsui te. Anata wa jiyuu chiiki no shuto ni imasu! Mawari o mimawashite kudasai, umi ga miemasu ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N07
Reply.text: Kono oshaberi o shiranaihito wa inaideshou ka? Itsumo yotte min'na ni jibun no hanashi o segamu.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_N09
Reply.text: Gyoson no hitotsu o otozurete mimashou. Soshite, kore o kono yoo ni minaide kudasai. Watashitachi no mura o nozoite, hoka no jimoto no shuuraku wa subete tan'naru gyosondesu. Shikashi, watashitachi wa soode wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: Kaijoo roodoo-sha no minasan, kon'nichiwa!

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P04
Reply.text: Maa, koko wa gyosondesu yo ne?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P06
Reply.text: Sotchoku ni itte, iie. Anata no aikokushin o kizutsukete shimattara gomen'nasai. Hoomaa roojin o sagashiteimasu. Kore o shirimasen ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P08
Reply.text: Dewa, doko de sagaseba ii nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer1_1_P10
Reply.text: Mochiron, kyootsuu-ten wa arimasen! Arigatoo, mi ni itte mimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: Anata ni iu koto wa nani mo arimasen.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: Sore wa zan'nenda.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer2_1_N01
Reply.text: Watashitachi wa koko de tsuri o shite imasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer2_1_P02
Reply.text: Sore wa akirakada.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N01
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa. Suwatte anaga o ippainomimashoo.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N02b
Reply.text: Arigatoo, de mo yarubeki shigoto ga aru nda.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N02a
Reply.text: O go tte kuretara kotowarimasen.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N03a
Reply.text: Nani ga shitakatta nodesu ka! Jibun de haraeyo, furiiroodaa.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer3_1_N04a
Reply.text: Jibun no anaga o nomimashou.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N01
Reply.text: Ryokoo-sha. Ohanashi o sa sete itadakimasunode, kichoona o jikan o sukoshi o jikan o kudasai.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N02
Reply.text: Saa, totemo kyoomi ga atte kiite imasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N03
Reply.text: Sore wa totemo mukashi no kotodatta… Soshite sore wa doko ka de okotta… Soshite sugoi… [Nemuri ni ochita]

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer4_1_N04
Reply.text: Kare o nekasete oite, watashi wa shigoto ni ikimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer5_1_N01
Reply.text: Watashi wa suwatte imasu, kanashiidesu…

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer5_1_N03
Reply.text: Ima wa dare ga rakudesu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_UnknownBar_Customer5_1_N04
Reply.text: Sate, koko ni suwatte kudasai…

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_N01
Reply.text: Umi wa dare o tsurete kuru nodeshou… Nani o tsurete kita nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_N03
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, joodanjanainara.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_N05
Reply.text: Soo, kare wa dokoni mo sunde inai, ittarikitari no tabi o tsudzukeru, ochitsuki no nai tamashiina nodesu. Kita no mura o mite kudasai.

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_P02
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, ryooshi-san!

Reply.name: r1m4_RandomBar_Customer1_1_P04
Reply.text: Hoomaa wa koko ni sunde inai nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000090
Reply.text: Watashi wa hitori no otoko o sagashiteimasu, kare no namae wa Hoomaa.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000091
Reply.text: Watashi wa sono yoona hito o shitte imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000092
Reply.text: Doko de mitsuke rareru ka wakaranaidesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000093
Reply.text: Kare wa itsumo aru mura kara betsu no mura e ryokoo shimasu. Kare ga doko ni iru no ka o seikaku ni iu koto wa darenimo dekimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000094
Reply.text: Sate, ji ni susumimasu.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N01
Reply.text: Anata wa watashi ni nani o motomete imasu ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N02
Reply.text: Kooiu tokubetsuna mono ga hitsuyoona ndesu.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N03
Reply.text: Hai, motte imasu. Yasuku yuzurimasu… 10000 koin de juubundesu.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N0c
Reply.text: Watashi ga omoudarou.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N04b
Reply.text: Okane ga tarinai ndesu.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Traider_1_N04a
Reply.text: Dooi shimasu.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_N01
Reply.text: Anata wa wareware o tetsudatte itadakemasu ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_N03
Reply.text: Watashitachi no sooko wa jimoto juumin ni yotte senkyo sa remashita.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_N05
Reply.text: Watashitachi wa korera no tochi no juumin to kanzen ni kenka shitakunainode, anata ni onegaishimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000088
Reply.text: Kyoomi naidesu.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_P02
Reply.text: Don'na goyoodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_P04
Reply.text: Naze kare o buryoku de gekitai dekinai nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_1_P06
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, sore o rikai shite mimasu.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_N01
Reply.text: Nantoka sooko o kaihoo dekimashita ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_N03
Reply.text: Kono kemono? Shi-soo ninai. Tsukamatte mo kyooryoku o kyohi suru.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_N05
Reply.text: Ima, sore o noseta ban wa gyoson o dete koko ni mukatte iru hazudesu.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_P02
Reply.text: Iie. Senjuumin-zoku wa shinu made tatakatte iru. Karera no riidaa o settoku shite zen'in o ie ni kisu koto ga dekirudeshou ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_P04
Reply.text: Shikashi, somosomo kare wa doko ni iru nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_2_P06
Reply.text: Arigatoo. Mitsukemasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_N01
Reply.text: Ririisu shite kurete arigatoo! Anatahadaredesu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_N03
Reply.text: Arigatoo. Anata wa gaikoku booeki-shoo kara no kaihoo no taigi ni ooini kooken shite kuremashita!

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_P02
Reply.text: Ima wa kankei arimasen. Suwatte kudasai, heishi-tachi no tokoro e tsurete ikimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_NearOlme_Leader1_1_P04
Reply.text: Watashiniha watashi nari no mokuhyoo ga arimasu. Demo tasukatte yokattadesu.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N01
Reply.text: Teishi! Dare ga ikimasu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N02
Reply.text: Ochitsuite kudasai, watashi wa anata no tekide wa arimasen.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N03
Reply.text: Sore o kimeru no wa watashitachidesu. Dareda ka oshietekudasai.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N04
Reply.text: Watashi wa anata to sooko no akewatashi kooshoo o suru to iu juuyoona ninmu o takusa remashita.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N05
Reply.text: Toreedaa-ra wa, wareware no shidoo-sha o tsukamaeru koto ga saizen no sakude wanai koto ni kidzuki, kare o kaihoo suru yooigadekiteiru nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N06
Reply.text: Karera wa anata no riidaa o tsukamaemashita ka? [Sukunakutomo karera wa watashi ni keikoku shitadeshou!]

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N07
Reply.text: Watashitachiha ima, kon'nan'na jiki o keiken shite imasu. Kono sooko wa, watashitachi ga kitanai toreedaa ni taishite yookyuu o shiji dekiru yuiitsu no shudandesu.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N08
Reply.text: De, nani ga nozomi?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N09
Reply.text: Genjitende wa, riidaa no kaihoo o motomete imasuga, sonogo, sooko o deru yoteidesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000095
Reply.text: Mendooda, minagoroshi ni shita kata ga rakuda.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N10
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, tetsudaimasu. Anata no riidaa wa dokodesu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N11
Reply.text: Moshi shitteita-ra, karera wa mizukara kaihoo shitadarou. Kore ga anata no omona shigotodesu - kare ga doko ni iru ka o mitsukeru kotodesu.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_1_N12
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, subete o shirabete mimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_2_N01
Reply.text: Watashitachi no riidaa wa doo yatte sukuwa reru nodeshou ka?
Reply.scriptCondition: QuestStatus('TRS_Quest2')==Q_COMPLETED and QuestStatus('FreeExtremistLeader_Quest4')~=Q_TAKEN and not(IsQuestTaken('TRS_Quest4')) and not(IsQuestTaken('KillExtremist_Quest1')) and not(IsQuestComplete('FreeExtremistLeader_Quest1'))

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_2_P02
Reply.text: Torikunde imasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_2_P03
Reply.text: Watashi wa jibun no kangae o kaemashita. Mushiro kimi o koroshite sooko o nottoritai.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_N01
Reply.text: Jibun no me ga shinjirarenai! Sono gaikoku hito wa yakusoku o mamorimashita. Watashitachi no riidaa ga futatabi watashitachi to issho ni imasu!

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_N03
Reply.text: Mochirondesu, dooshi! Hakoberu kagiri no shinamono o motte, mata modotte kite kudasai.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_P02
Reply.text: Saa, anata mo jibun no mono o hokan shite kudasai. Sooko o sora ni shimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_Storage_Guard1_3_P04
Reply.text: Kanarazu modotte kimasu.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N01
Reply.text: Saikin wa doodesu ka?

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N02b
Reply.text: Mada shinkoo-chuudesu.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N02a
Reply.text: Sooko mo kirei ni nari, shigoto mo owarimashita.

Reply.name: Olme_Bar_Customer2_3_N03a
Reply.text: Subarashii! Kore ga anata no hooshuudesu.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N01
Reply.text: Wakamono yo, watashi wa komatteimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N02
Reply.text: Doo shita no?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N03
Reply.text: Otto wa ichiba ni itte shissoo shimashita. Osoraku shoohin o utte nomi hajimeta nodarou. Sorede watashi wa kare o sagashi ni ikimashita.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N04b
Reply.text: Korera wa anata no mondaidesu. Anata jishin de kaiketsu shite kudasai.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N04a
Reply.text: Kare o mitsukeru no o tetsudatte ageru yo.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N05a
Reply.text: Arigatoo wakamono, Paachi no mura de watashi o mitsukeru koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N06a
Reply.text: Oshietekudasai, anata no otto no namae wa nanidesu ka? Soshite anata no gaiken o setsumei shite kudasai.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N07a
Reply.text: Hai mochiron! Kare no namae wa Filemon. Gaku ni hootai o maita kaarii. 'Okite dekaketa' ga kuchiguse de, pinku no burausu mo daisuki.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_1_N09a
Reply.text: Wakatta. Jimoto no baa o mawatte sagashite mimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N01
Reply.text: Anata wa watashi ni nani o nozonde imasu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N02
Reply.text: Filemon, anata no tsuma wa kanzen ni anata o sagashite tachiagarazu, koko de anata wa baa no mawari ni suwatte imasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N03
Reply.text: Kanojo ni wa moo akita! Yasuma sete kudasai, dansei-tachi to issho ni suwatte kudasai.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N04
Reply.text: Ie made okutte agemashou.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N05
Reply.text: Ie ni kaeritakunai! Soshite watashi wa anata ni unzari shite, tachiagatte koko o sarimashita.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N06
Reply.text: Yoi jooken de gooi shita hoo ga iidesu yo!

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N07
Reply.text: Kiitekudasai, okane o agemashou, sorede watashi o hanatte oite kureru nodesu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N08b
Reply.text: Iya, ka ni tsuretekaeru to yakusoku shitanoni!

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N09b
Reply.text: Nani mo suru koto wanai, ikimashou. Watashi wa moo anata ni akimashita.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N08a
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, gomen'nasai. Ikutsu ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N09a
Reply.text: 500 koinde iideshou ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_Husbent1_1_N10a
Reply.text: Watashi wa anata ni koreijoo kitai shite imasendeshita. Koko ni kite.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N01
Reply.text: Watashi no otto o tsurete kimashita ka?

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02d
Reply.text: Iie. Jibun de sagashite kudasai.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02c
Reply.text: Mada sagashiteimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02b
Reply.text: Mitsuketa. Kare wa mura ni iru yo…

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N02a
Reply.text: Kare wa soko ni ite, genki ni ikite imasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N03a
Reply.text: Nanto kansha shite ii no ka sae wakarimasen. Kochira ni urimono ga aru node, oyuzurishimasu.

Reply.name: r1m4_SomeWhere_OldWomen1_2_N04a
Reply.text: Arigatoo. Sayoonara.

Reply.name: KonnyBlide_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, watashitachi wa wakai fuufu, Konii to Kurai. Ie ni kaeru no o tetsudatte kuremasen ka. Soodenai to, watashitachi no kuruma wa kanzen ni koshoo shite shimaimasu… Juubun'na okane o shiharaimasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001081
Reply.text: Iie, anata ni wa nani ka fushin'na ten ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001080
Reply.text: Mochiron suwatte kudasai.

Reply.name: KonnyBlide_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Tsurete kite kurete arigatoo. Soshite koko ni watashitachi no tomodachi ga imasu! Saa, ushiro ni aru mono o narabete mimashou. Kore wa gootoodesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001084
Reply.text: Watashi no shitai no ue ni nomi! Nani mo e raremasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001083
Reply.text: Soo, anata-tachi wa futsuu no sanzokuna nodesu! Hoshiimono wa uketotte kudasai. Tada korosanaide kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001085
Reply.text: Ha-ha! Min'na, shuppatsu shimashou!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001086
Reply.text: Dakara kono ato wa hito o shinjite…

Reply.name: CrazyMan_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Toorisuginaide kudasai! Atarashii kankaku o taiken shitaidesu ka, okane o kasegitaidesu ka, soretomo tada asobitaidesu ka? Sorenara entaateimentosentaa ni iku hitsuyoo ga arimasu! Motto shiritai?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001091
Reply.text: Aki jikan ni wa kyoomi ga nai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001088
Reply.text: Saa, oshiete.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001241
Reply.text: Entaateimentosentaa wa subarashii bashodesu! Chiiki no torakku untenshu zen'in ga goraku no tame ni okane o tsuiyasu tame ni soko ni atsumarimasu. Mayowanai yoo ni chizu de go an'nai shimasu. Koko ga kare ga iru bashodesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001244
Reply.text: Dono yoona entaateimentosentaa ga aru no ka ?? mite mimashou.

Reply.name: ArchitectorMinin_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, wakamono. Kenchiku no rekishi ni kyoomigaarimasu ka? Demo, soreha mondaide wa arimasen. Watashi no jikan ga chikadzuite imasuga, dare mo roojin o saigo no ansoku no ji made tsurete ikou to wa shimasen. Chikaku ni wa bunka-teki kachi no takai iseki ga ari, sokode watashi wa yasuragi o eru koto ga dekimashita. Watashi o soko e tsureteitte kuremasen ka? Kandai ni shiharaimasu. Soodenakereba shichoo-shitsu o nokku shinakereba narimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001097
Reply.text: Mooshiwakearimasenga, otetsudai dekimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001098
Reply.text: Watashi wa anata no iu koto ga wakarimasu. Mochiron tetsudaimasu yo.

Reply.name: ArchitectorMinin_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Koko ni imasu. Arigatoo. Mamonaku, watashi wa korera no subarashii kodai no tatemono no hitotsu de yasumu koto ni narimasu.

Reply.name: Labirint_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Shinda machi no furui uchinonaka ni iru akutoo o ichi-ri tsukamaeru no o tetsudatte kuremasen ka? Kare wa totemo kookatsude, itsumo watashitachi kara kakurete imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001103
Reply.text: Iie, jibun de tsukamaete kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001100
Reply.text: Maa, kore wa watashi o tanoshima sete kuremasuga, soo shinai to, nonbiri to noru no ni tsukarete shimaimasu. Naze anata wa sore ga hitsuyoona nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001104
Reply.text: Michi no sakini wa entaateimentosentaa ga arimashita. Tsui saikin, sore wa taosa reta sanzoku ni yotte hakai sa remashita. Soshite, watashitachi no chiku no juumin wa soko de tanoshinde okane o tsukau no ga daisukideshita. Watashitachiha yoka o dainashi ni shita toozoku o zen'in tsukamaemashita. Demo, kono imaimashii machi ni wa itsumo hitori ga kakurete iru nda! Watashitachi o tasuketekudasai, soo sureba watashitachi wa anata ni kandaina hooshuu o ataemasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001105
Reply.text: Mondainai! Ima sugu kare o tsukamaemashou!

Reply.name: Circus_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Gomen'nasai, aiboo… Anata wa osoraku watashitachi no entaateimento sentaa de tanoshinde okane o kasegu tame ni koko ni kita nodeshou? Nani mo umaku ikimasen… Ichibu no toozoku wa taikin o ushinai, arayuru mono o hakai shi hajimemashita… Demo, tebura de koko o saritaku arimasen ka? Semete nazonazo o oshiete agemashou. 100 koin shiharau to 2-bai kakutoku dekimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001108
Reply.text: Zan'nenda. Iie, nazonazo wa watashiniha muite imasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001107
Reply.text: Sukunakutomo nani ka. Kore ga okanedesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001234
Reply.text: Chuuibukaku mimiwokatamukeru! Kuroi kuruma ni notta hakujin no doraibaa to, shiroi kuruma ni notta kokujin no doraibaa ga semai michi de sooguu shita. Dotchi ga saki ni shinudeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001239
Reply.text: Suisoku shimasendeshita! Shiroi kuruma no kokujin no untenshu wa, jibun no enerugii o subete torakku ni tsuiyashite iruga, karadawoarau jikan sae nai, futsuu no kinben'na torakku untenshudesu. Soshite, kuroi kuruma ni notte iru shiroi untenshu wa, itsumo jibun no koto o ki ni kake, sha o hiretsuna jootai ni tamotsu gootoodesu. Torakku untenshu wa saigomade teikoo shimasuga, soredemo shinudeshou, nazenara jinsei wa otogibanashide wanaikaradesu, kokode wa tsuneni aku ga kachimasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001240
Reply.text: Watashi no okane wa naite imashita. Anata no nazonazo ga machigatte iru dakedesu…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001237
Reply.text: Migi! Shiroi kuruma no kokujin no untenshu wa, jibun no enerugii o subete torakku ni tsuiyashite iruga, karadawoarau jikan sae nai, futsuu no kinben'na torakku untenshudesu. Soshite, kuroi kuruma ni notte iru shiroi untenshu wa, itsumo jibun no koto o ki ni kake, sha o hiretsuna jootai ni tamotsu gootoodesu. Torakku untenshu wa saigomade teikoo shimasuga, soredemo shinudeshou, nazenara jinsei wa otogibanashide wanaikaradesu, kokode wa tsuneni aku ga kachimasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001238
Reply.text: Orokana nazonazo. Watashi no shookin o kaeshite kudasai!

Reply.name: Circus_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Entaateimento sentaa wa moo eigyoo shite imasen. Kuruma no muki o kaeru koto mo dekimasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001242
Reply.text: Zan'nendakedo doo shiyou ka na…

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Doko ni iku no? Miemasen ka, shimatte imasu!
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken( 'd_MoveToPesht_Quest' ) and not(IsQuestTaken( 'd_RideAcrossBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_RideAcrossBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestTaken( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' ))

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Toozoku-tachi wa tsuini gunji kichi no kasoo-kai o kaihoo shi, kyooryokuna buki o te ni iremashita. Karera wa goodatsu o kyooka suru tame ni kono kichi de watashitachi o kowagara sete iru dakeda to omoimashitaga, ima dewa nigeru jikan sae arimasen. Nani mo shinakereba, karera wa watashitachi no kagayakashii toshi o senryoo surudeshou.

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Soko ni aru michi wa nitsu dakedesu. Watashitachi no machi o tooru ka, toozoku no sookutsu o tooru kadesu.

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_3
Reply.text: Iie. Genzai, toshi wa heisa sa rete imasu. Watashitachiha mori no tachiba ni arimasu. Toozoku to no mondai ga kaiketsu sa reru made, gai ni wa kaigenrei ga shika rete iru.

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Nani ga oki teru? Nande min'na kurutta yoo ni hashirimawatteru no? Hi ga mienai?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Hai, sore wa anata ni totte kantande wa arimasen… Tokorode, hokutoo e no ikikata o oshiete moraemasu ka?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Sore de tooshite moraemasu ka?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: Nani o suru ka?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Miemasen ka?! Tsuuro ga shimatte iru!
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' ) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'd_GetBomb_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestTaken( 'd_GetBomb_Quest' ))

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Anata wa kanri shimashita ka?

Reply.name: PeshtGuardian_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Shitsumon ga aru yoodesu ne?

Reply.name: BaseGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Dare ga watashitachi ni kita nodesu ka!

Reply.name: BaseGuardian_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Mite! Kochira ga watashitachi no yookina nakamadesu. Mata shinkei o kusuguritaidesu ka? Kondo wa soo kantan ni wa hanasanai zo!

Reply.name: BaseGuardian_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Shiharau! Hashiwowataru ryookin wa 250 koin!

Reply.name: BanditPeshtGuardian_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Dono yoona hitobito! Gozonji no toori, anata no kooken wa watashitachi o ooini tasukete kuremashita. Kono kingaku de watashitachiha-shi no anchisukiru ni wairo o watasu koto ga deki, goran no toori, tooroku o henkoo shimashita. Tsumari, anata wa ima, aru imi, watashitachi no suponsaana nodesu. Wa wa wa! Shikashi, dakaratoitte koko o jitaku no yoo ni kuruma de hashireru wakede wa arimasen. Mochiron o nebiki sa sete itadakimasuga. Wa wa wa! Kojin no baai wa 500 koin to narimasu.

Reply.name: NonBomber_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Asugarudo e yookoso!

Reply.name: Bomber_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Dono yoona unmeidesu ka?

Reply.name: Bomber_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Tasuketekurete arigatoo! Kono yoona kyohi no ato, karera wa nagaiai watashitachi o nayama seru koto wa arimasen. Nani ga hitsuyoodeshita ka? Bakuhatsu-mono? Hai, hitsuyoona dake omeshiagarikudasai! Zenryoona hito ni totte, sore wa zan'nen'na kotode wa arimasen.

Reply.name: MininMer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Isogashiinode hayaku hanashite kudasai!

Reply.name: MininMer_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Doomo arigatoo. Masani hiningenteki! Watashitachi wa tsuini inochi no kiken o kanjiru koto naku, jiyuu ni kokyuu dekiru yoo ni narimashita.

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Dooyara tooku kara kitarashii. Bijinesudesu ka, soretomo booken o o sagashidesu ka?

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Nani ga hoshii no, furoo-sha?

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg15
Reply.text: Sate, watashi no mochibeeshon wa doodesu ka? Doo iu wake ka, zero ga 2-tsu hyooji sa remasen.

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Mata ka?!

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Nani ka wakarimashita ka?

Reply.name: MininWorker_hellodlg4
Reply.text: Nani ga hoshiidesu ka, mishiranu hito?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000639
Reply.text: Kita ni sunde iru hito o sagashiteimasu. Sorera no bubun e no michi o oshiete moraemasu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000640
Reply.text: Gozonji no toori, betsu no mondai ga hassei shimasu. Sudeni okidzuki no toori, watashitachi no machide wa gasorin ni mondai ga arimasu. Yori seikaku ni ieba, mattaku arimasen. Watashitachi no kyaraban wa kita e wa ikemasen. Shikashi, Orumu e no michi wa kantande wa arimasen. Kare o hitori de mitsukeru koto wa dekinaideshou. Anata ga tasukete kuretara, watashitachi no kyaraban to issho ni kita e iku koto ga dekimasu. Karera wa Orumu e no michi o oshiete kurerudeshou. Tsugini shichoo ni shitsumon shite kudasai. Mondai o kaiketsu suru tame ni Shaakii ga haken sa reta to tsutaete kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000641
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, ima kara kare no tokoro ni ikimasu.

Reply.name: MininWorker2_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Arigatoo! Anata wa watashitachi no machi to watashitachi zen'in o ooini tasukete kuremashita. Anata wa itsu demo koko de kangei sa reru gesutodesu. Anata no tame ni - subete ga waribiki sa remasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001095
Reply.text: Sekiyu no ryuutsuu ga kakuritsu sa retara, watashitachi no kyaraban ni shitagau koto ga dekimasu. Kita e no tadashii michi, yukitai basho o seikaku ni oshiete kuremasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001096
