Reply.name: WorkerForMoney_hellodlg0
Reply.text: E, son'na keesu aru no?

Reply.name: OilMineWorker_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Kore ga saisho no sekiyu barerudesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz447
Reply.text: Chikaku ni omoshiroi ton'neru ga aru to kikimashita. Yama no naka o massugu nishi ni mukatte susunde ikimasu. Kiita koto ga arimasen ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz450
Reply.text: Maa, mochiron kikimashita yo. Kokode wa subete o shitte imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz451
Reply.text: Doko kara hajimaru no ka oshiete moraemasu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz452
Reply.text: Anata no chizu-joo ni sore o maaku sa sete kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz453
Reply.text: Totemo kantan? Okane ya tasuke ga hitsuyoode wanaidesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz454
Reply.text: O wakai kata, watashi ni shoogyoo o oshieru hitsuyoo wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz455
Reply.text: Nani itteru ndesu ka, kangae mo shimasendeshita!

Reply.name: AsgardBarman_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Matamata anatadesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz449
Reply.text: Zenkai no miitingu de anata ga hanashite ita koto wa rikai dekita yoona ki ga shimasu. Moshika shitara anata mo ton'neru no kagi o motte irudeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz456
Reply.text: Chuuibukaku mite miruto… Mochiron, kore ni wa aruteido no rooryoku ga hitsuyoodeari, sarani wa jikan no sonshitsu ya rieki no sonshitsu mo hassei shimasu. 10000 koin areba juubunda to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz465
Reply.text: Ayamaranakute daijoobu. Ko no yoona kaimono o suru to, kanzen ni hasan shite shimaimasu. Soredemo, arigatoo.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz457
Reply.text: Sate, soshite kakaku! Demo haraimasu yo.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz459
Reply.text: Kore de nishi e ikeru yoo ni narimashita!
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuest('d_FindKeyInTunel_Quest'); FailQuestIfTaken('d_FindZasadaInTunel_Quest'); TakeQuest('d_OpenTunel_Quest'); TDeactivate ('ZASADATUNEL'); AddPlayerMoney( -10000 ); AddQuestItem('quest_key_for_tunnel'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: AsgardBarman_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Wasureta baai, kii no kakaku wa 10000 koin.

Reply.name: AsgardBarman_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Watashi wa baatendaadesu. Otetsudai shimashou?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000632
Reply.text: Hai, on'nanoko o otte imashita. Kanojo wa kono machi ni tachiyoru ka, sukunakutomo chikaku o tsuuka surubekideshita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000633
Reply.text: Kangae sasete kudasai… Sonotooridesu! Kanojo wa koko ni imashita. Kanojo wa ton'neru o kayotte shuppatsu shita to omoimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000634
Reply.text: Ton'neru? ! Nani no ton'neru? ! Doko ni aru no ka oshiete moraemasu ka?

Reply.name: UnknownFromTunel_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Sekkaku hanashi teru ndakara, semete nomimono demo chuumon shite yo!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz467
Reply.text: Baatendaa, nani ka sosoide kudasai. Soshite sono teeburu de watashi no yuujin o motenashimasu. Kare no gurasu ga tsuneni mitasa rete iru koto o kakuninshitekudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz468
Reply.text: Hai, aishiteimasu!.. Hai, minasan… Anata wa mada… Watashi o shirimasen… Fu tsu, ru-ru-ru…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz469
Reply.text: Aiboo, moo yotteru yo! Soshite koko ga kagidesu! Soshite dare mo kega o shinakatta. Saa, darenimo minogasa renai uchi ni, isoide ton'neru e mukaimashou!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d174
Reply.text: Toozoku-tachi wa nidoto kono michi o tooru koto wanaidarou. Betsu no hoohoo mo sagasanakereba narimasen. Shinai de kiite mimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d176
Reply.text: Tanken-ka Iwan ga chikaku ni sunde ita to kiita. Kare no ie ni itte mitai to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d177
Reply.text: Anata wa tadashii basho ni kimashita. Iwan wa tsuma to musuko to issho ni, masani kono machi, ano ie ni sunde imashita. Soshite fukoo ga okorimashita. Otto no rusu-chuu ni tsuma ga sanzoku no yashuu o ukete nakunarimashita. Mochiron, ikite nigeta akuyaku wa hitori mo imasendeshita. Iwan wa musuko o tsurete doko ka e satte shimaimashita. Soshite ie wa mada akiyadesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d192
Reply.text: Anata no azayakana setsumei ni itchi suru mono o mita koto ga arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d194
Reply.text: Mochiron tazunemasuga, mazuwa saigomade kiitekudasai. Sate, chijin kara kiita hanashi, mata chijin kara kiita hanashidesu…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d196
Reply.text: Ryooshi-san no namae wa shitte imashita… wasurete shimaimashita. Sorede, sono ryooshi wa, suichuu no takaramono to shugo monsutaa to iu kyoomibukai basho ni tsuite no hanashi o shite imashita. Tashika ni, dare mo nani mo mitsuke raremasendeshita. Dooyara, kono basho no seikakuna ichi o shitte iru no wa ryooshi hon'nin dakeda soodesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d198
Reply.text: Dare ni tsuite hanashi teru no?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d200
Reply.text: Mooshiwakearimasenga, watashi no kioku ni nanika ga okorimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d202
Reply.text: Hora, kooiu toki wa mochibeeshon ga hitsuyoona ndesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d208
Reply.text: Nanika o omoidashi hajimete imasu. Un! Sore wa Hoomaa roojindeshita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d210
Reply.text: Ryooshi-tachi wa doko ni iru nodesu ka, kaigan ni iru nodesu! Mura no naka de. Koko de nomi, betsu no mondai ga hassei shimasu. Sudeni okidzuki no toori, watashitachi no machide wa gasorin ni mondai ga arimasu. Yori seikaku ni ieba, mattaku arimasen. Watashitachi no kyaraban wa kita e wa ikemasen. Shikashi, Orumu e no michi wa kantande wa arimasen. Anata wa kare o hitoride wa mitsuke rarenaideshou…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d212
Reply.text: Nanishiteruno? Gyaku ni! Anata wa yuukan'na hitodesu ne. Anata ga tasukete kuretara, watashitachi no kyaraban to issho ni kita e iku koto ga dekimasu. Karera wa Orumu e no michi o oshiete kurerudeshou. Tsugini shichoo ni shitsumon shite kudasai. Mondai o kaiketsu suru tame ni Shaakii ga haken sa reta to tsutaete kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d217
Reply.text: Anata? Sate, imanara don'na tasuke mo kari rarerudeshou…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d219
Reply.text: Kore wa jooku no yoona monodesu. 'Juu ga happoo shinakatta no ni wa 20 no riyuu ga arimasu. Mazu, yakkyoo ga nakatta kotodesu.' Sekiyu kussaku soochi wa toozoku ni senryoo sa remashita. Karera wa chikaku no doko ka ni teijuu shi, watashitachi no chikara o kanzen ni tsukaihatasu made shuugeki o jikkoo shimashita. Soshite ima, karera wa watashitachi o sekiyu-gen kara kanzen ni shadan shimashita. Gasorin no kyookyuu ga nokorisukunaku natte kite imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d222
Reply.text: Sotchoku ni itte, watashitachiha naibumondai de isogashikattanode, amari arasou koto wa arimasendeshita. Roodoo kumiai ga sutoraiki o okoshita nodesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d224
Reply.text: Hitokoto de ieba… Hai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d226
Reply.text: Goori-tekina han'i-nai de.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d228
Reply.text: Shikashi, oiru wa shizen ni nagarederu wakede wa arimasen. Kono akutoo-domo wa ima, kooeki no tame ni hataraku kawari ni, baa de zubon o fuite iru nodesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d233
Reply.text: Shigoto tte ittai nanina no? Watashitachiha sutoraiki-chuudesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d235
Reply.text: Shigoto wa kitsui, kyuuryoo wa hon'no wazuka. Dakara watashitachiha roodoo-sha to shite hataraku koto o kyohi shimasu! Soshite inudearu shichoo wa watashitachi no mondai kara rieki o ete imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d237
Reply.text: Sore o dainashi ni shita no wa kare jishindatta. Naze shichoo ga hitsuyoona no ka mattaku wakarimasen. Tokuni kon'na kanji. Watashitachiha hatarakanai, sore dakeda!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d239
Reply.text: Tazuneru koto mo shinaide kudasai!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d243
Reply.text: Watashi wa soo anata ni itta! Moo kare no jooshi ni naru no wa yamete kudasai! Aetara kao o fuite ageru yo.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d252
Reply.text: Sore wa oogonshokudesuga, soko no jookyoo wa jigokudesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d254
Reply.text: Chottomatte. Naze-soo shinai nodesu ka? Hoshiidesu. Mochiageru mono sae te ni haire rarereba.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d261
Reply.text: Daremoga Risa o hitsuyoo to shite imasu. Tada, soreha darenimo atae rareru monode wa arimasen. Ha-ha-ha!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d263
Reply.text: Somosomo koko o hanareru nante dare ga itta no? Kidzuite inai kamo shiremasenga, watashitachiha jitsuwa osoroshii sanzokuna nodesu. Sate, minasan, kono namaikina otoko ni manaa o oshiemashou?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d269
Reply.text: Watashi wa kono on'nanoko o shitte imasu. Jissai no tokoro, watashi wa darenimo kanojo to kakawaru koto o susumemasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d271
Reply.text: Sono ushironi wa erai hito-tachi ga iru. Soshite kikendesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d273
Reply.text: Kanojo wa shigoto de yoku koko ni kimasu. Hotondo toorisugimasu. Zenkai, tsui saikin, kanojo wa azuma e mukatte ita. Kurikaeshi ni narimasuga, kono hookoo de kanojo o tsuikyuu suru koto wa o susume shimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_d3d275
Reply.text: Soko ni wa sanzoku no kyoten ga aru. Kanari ookikute shikkari to kyooka sa rete iru. Shikashi, sanzoku wa buki no gengo shika rikai dekimasen. Anata wa karera to kyoosoo dekiru hodo tsuyoidesu ka? Wakaranai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2149
Reply.text: Hashi o bakuha suru.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2151
Reply.text: Gunji kichi e no michi ga tooru michidesu. Hashi ga bakuha sa rereba, teki wa watashitachi no machi ni tootatsu dekinaku narimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2153
Reply.text: Mazu daiichi ni, bakuhatsu-mono o mitsukeru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Asugarudo ni mo onajiyoona mono ga aru hazuda. Kekkyokunotokoro, karera wa koozanroodoo-shana nodesu. Soshite hashi ni totsugeki shinakereba narimasen. Mochiron, kare wa mamora rete imasu… Shikashi, anata wa sore o atsukau koto ga dekimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2157
Reply.text: Kihontekini, bakuhatsu-mono o koonyuu suru no ni saitekina basho ni kimashita. Sono na no toori tooten no supesharitedesu. Sekaijuu kara hitobito ga watashitachi no subarashii seihin o koonyuu suru tame ni koko ni kimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2159
Reply.text: Shikashi, genjitende wa seisan-joo no mondai ga hassei shite imasu. Shitagatte, kongo 12-kakan wa, tatoe shooryoo no seihindeatte mo teikyoo suru koto ga dekinaku narimasu. Saikin, bakuhatsu-mono ga hijoo ni ninki ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2161
Reply.text: Junsui ni jindoo-joo no riyuu kara, koozan murade wa toosha no seihin yori mo haruka ni hinshitsu no warui seihin ga koonyuu dekiru koto o oshirase shimasu. Dooyara furui sooko o mitsuketarashii.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2165
Reply.text: Sore o hitsuyoo to shite iru no wa anata dakede wa arimasen. Toozoku-tachi ga mata osoikakatte kimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2167
Reply.text: Subete ga kabe ni arimasu. Teki wa tooranai! Bakuhatsu-mono ga hitsuyoona baai wa, bakuhatsu-mono o mamoru no o tetsudatte kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2200
Reply.text: Watashitachi ga tan'ni anata no okane o uketotte anata no shitai o umeru koto o samatagete iru no wa nanidesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_dd2202
Reply.text: Dakarakoso watashi wa kono hito no yuumoa no sensu ga daisukina nodesu! Sate, okane o haratte tsugini susumimashou. Demo ne, mata chikaku ni arawaretara buttsubushite yaru yo, kono yaroo!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_den192
Reply.text: Ha-ha-ha, warawa sete moraimashita. Jibun no me ga shinji raremasen. Kono bagu wa watashitachi no shuchuu ni shin'nyuu shi, betsu no mono o yookyuu shimasu. Saikin, gootoo ya satsujin ga tahatsu shite hontooni kanashii kimochi ni natte imasu. Jaa, kimi wa totemo omoshiroikara, 10000 haratte tsugi e susumimashou…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_den195
Reply.text: Shutsugen shitara sugu ni dai kangeidesu. Sonoaida ni, deteike!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d178
Reply.text: Ohanashi o arigatoogozaimasu. Itte miyou to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d180
Reply.text: Okane o totte kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d181
Reply.text: Kakaku wa watashi ni totte taka sugimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d184
Reply.text: Kudaranai! Sore wa nanto warui kotodeshou.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d191
Reply.text: Kono yoona kyodaina koozoo-mono o sagashiteimasu. Ichido mitara wasure rarenai to iwa remasu. Anata no chiiki no doko ka ni aru hazudesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d193
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, hokanohito ni kiite mimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d195
Reply.text: Kiitekudasai, kurushimanaide kudasai!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d197
Reply.text: Sore de, kare no namae wa nanideshita ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d199
Reply.text: Soo, ryooshi-san no kotodesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d201
Reply.text: Dakara oboete mite kudasai! Sore wa hijoo ni juuyoodesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d203
Reply.text: Koin 100-mai sashiagemasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d204
Reply.text: Genjitende wa, watashiniha anata no seishin-teki nooryoku o shigeki suru mono wa nani mo arimasen…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d206
Reply.text: Koko ni koin ga 100-mai arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d207
Reply.text: Okane wa sugu ni todokimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d209
Reply.text: Hoomaa? Doko de mitsuke raremasu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d211
Reply.text: Nanda, motto kin o sebirou to shite iru no ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d213
Reply.text: Ima kara shichoo no tokoro ni ikimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d215
Reply.text: Shaakii wa mondai o kaiketsu suru tame ni haken sa remashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d218
Reply.text: Anata no mondai wa nanidesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d220
Reply.text: Machinaka no sanzoku ni taisho dekinai toki ni, watashi ni hitori de sanzoku to tatakatte moraitai nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d223
Reply.text: Tsumari, juugyooin ni shigoto o suru yoo settoku shi tari, atarashii juugyooin o mitsuke tari suruhitsuyoogaaru to iu kotodesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d225
Reply.text: Sate, kantan'na mondai, sanzoku kara hajimemashou. Gasorin ga seiki-hin ni naru koto o negatte imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d229
Reply.text: [Atama no naka] Soshite saifu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d230
Reply.text: Roodoo-sha-tachi to nanigadekiruka kangaete mimasu. Karera o settoku shite mimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d232
Reply.text: Doo shimasu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d234
Reply.text: Ittai nani ga mondaina nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d236
Reply.text: Sorede kare wa, kono machi wa mazushiku, sanzoku ni yotte kanzen ni hakai sa rete iru to iimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d238
Reply.text: Demo hontooni hitsuyoona no…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d240
Reply.text: Nani o suru ka? Koko de nani ga okotte iru no ka o rikai suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d242
Reply.text: Ossharu toori, shichoo wa doroboodeari sagi-shidesu. Kare ga ichi no tomi o mochisatta basho o mitsukemashita!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d244
Reply.text: Anata wa jibun no jooshi ni natta nodesukara, hatarakimasu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d246
Reply.text: Sorekara ushiro ni noborimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d247
Reply.text: Watashi wa kanojo o machi ni tsurete iki, nenryoo fusoku wa moo okoranai koto o min'na ni tsutaemasu. Nani mo okoranai yoo ni wazato kinai ni okimasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d249
Reply.text: Kita e no michi wa doo naru no?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d251
Reply.text: Chikaku no yusei wa shiyoo sa rete inai. Koko wa kinkooda!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d253
Reply.text: Soo shitakunai nodeareba, sore wa anata no shigotodesu. Hoka ni mo mitsukemasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d255
Reply.text: Ikutsu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d257
Reply.text: Te o watashite, ushiro ni norikomimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d258
Reply.text: Watashi ga omoudarou…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d260
Reply.text: Risa ga hitsuyoona ndesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d262
Reply.text: Anata ga sore o motte iru koto wa shitte imasu. Soshite watashi wa kanojo nashide wa sarimasen!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d264
Reply.text: Tatoe anata ga satandeatte mo, watashi wa ki ni shimasen. Kita mono wa kanarazu te ni iremasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d266
Reply.text: Watashi wa kore kurai no shinchoo de, utsukushiku, jibun no kuruma o unten shite iru on'nanoko o sagashiteimasu. Kosei-tekina dezain. Mezurashii iro. Kanojo wa jibun jishin o Risa to yobimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d268
Reply.text: Iie. Kanojo wa watashi ga hontooni kikitai koto o shitte iru dakedesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d272
Reply.text: Kowagara senaide kudasai! Anata ga shitte iru koto o oshietekudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d274
Reply.text: Hoka ni wa nani ga aru no?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_d3d276
Reply.text: Hoka ni hoohoo ga nainode, iku shika arimasen. Dakara shitsureina koto wa shinaide kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2148
Reply.text: Wakarimashita. Soshite, watashi o tooshite morau ni wa doosureba iidesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2150
Reply.text: Hoka ni don'na hashi ga arudeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2152
Reply.text: Dewa, doosureba yoideshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2154
Reply.text: [Atama no naka] Anata jishin no ashi wa doodesu ka, karete imasen ka? Jakusha-tachi…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2156
Reply.text: Sakkyuu ni bakuhatsu-mono ga hitsuyoodesu! Shikatsumondai!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2158
Reply.text: Kinkyuuda to itte imasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2160
Reply.text: Demo hontooni hitsuyoona ndesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2164
Reply.text: Bakuhatsu-mono o bichiku shite iru to kikimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2168
Reply.text: Mata nijuugo. Tatakai no nai hi wa arimasen, nante jinseideshou!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2170
Reply.text: Sore wa yoi…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2201
Reply.text: Chisei, meiyo, ryooshin?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_dd2203
Reply.text: Sore wa umaku ikimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den1198
Reply.text: Matte! Unchin o shiharau junbi wa dekite imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den1199
Reply.text: Ochitsuite kudasai, moo hotondo okane o kaseide imasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den191
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa… Minasan, gookaku shitai nodesuga…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den193
Reply.text: Son'nani mottenai ndesuga…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den194
Reply.text: Kore ga okanedesu…
Reply.scriptResult: CompleteQuestIfTaken( 'd_RideAcrossBase_Quest'); CompleteQuest( 'd_MoveToPesht_Quest'); TakeQuest('d_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest'); CompleteQuest( 'd_GiveMoneyToBase_Quest'); AddPlayerMoney( -10000 ); GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('BASEATTACK'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_den196
Reply.text: Moosukoshi kangaete mimasu.

Reply.name: AboutThief_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Doo shita no?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000624
Reply.text: Darekaga chichi no ie ni gootoo o iremashita!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000623
Reply.text: Nanika ga okotta no wa wakatte imashita! Saikin, kimyoode fushin'na jinbutsu ga kono atari o urotsuite imashita. Karedatta to omoimasu. Watashi wa kare ga sanzoku no kichi ni mukatte kuruma de mukau no o mita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000625
Reply.text: Hinto o arigatoo…

Reply.name: Thief_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Soshite, anata wa daredesu ka? Watashi wa anata o shiranai!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000627
Reply.text: Shin'ainaru, anata wa watashinokazoku no meiyo o bujoku shimashita! Anata wa watashinokazoku no hooseki o nusumimashita… Watashi wa anata to hanasu no ga fukaide, anata no monode wanai kono mono o kaeshite hoshii to onegai shite imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000628
Reply.text: Nani? Rikaidekinai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000629
Reply.text: Watashi wa gekido shite imasu. Ima, watashi wa anata o koroshimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000630
Reply.text: Mazuwa oitsuki…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000631
Reply.text: Shin'ainaru, anata wa shitaidesu!

Reply.name: Anticwar_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Watashitachiha ikkai no kookogaku-shadesuga, arayuru shurui no sagi-shi ga watashitachi no hakkutsu choosa o boogai shite imasu. Karera o oiharatte kurereba yoi nodesuga…
Reply.scriptCondition: not(IsQuestTaken('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestTaken('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('HelpRuins_Quest'))

Reply.name: Anticwar_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Sokode nani ga okotte iru no ka mite mimashou…

Reply.name: Anticwar_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Iie, doo iu wake ka anata jishin ga…

Reply.name: Antisincer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Otoko, okane o kasegitaidesu ka? Naze watashi ga tazuneru ka to iu to, koko ni wa orokamono-tachi ga hakkutsu o hajimeta iseki ga arimasu. Basho wa enkakuchideari, karera wa buki o motte imasen. Sekyuriti-joo hasan suru koto wa hotondo nainode, kanari no rieki o eru koto ga dekimasu. Watashi to isshodesu ka?
Reply.scriptCondition: not(IsQuestTaken('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestTaken('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('HelpRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('DestroyRuins_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('HelpRuins_Quest'))

Reply.name: Antisincer_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Watashi wa hairu.

Reply.name: Antisincer_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Iie, watashi node wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Watashi ni yoojigaaru to omoimasu ka?

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Yoi nyuusudesu. Shinai no minasama ni shuuchi sa sete itadakimasu.

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Hai, korosseo no oopun ni tsuite hanashitai nodesuga…

Reply.name: Kollizey1_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Sore wa yoi.

Reply.name: Kollizey2_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Watashi ni yooji ga arimasu ka?

Reply.name: Kollizey2_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Subarashii! Dekirudakehayaku chiiki zentai ni shiraseru hitsuyoo ga arimasu. Ima kara kore o yarimasu.

Reply.name: Kollizey2_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Hai, korosseo no oopun ni tsuite hanashitai to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Kollizey3_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Watashi ni?

Reply.name: Kollizey3_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Nanto nyuusuda! Shira sete kurete arigatoogozaimasu.

Reply.name: Kollizey3_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Hai, korosseo no oopun ni tsuite hanashitai to omoimasu.

Reply.name: MainSigner_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Tonari no mura no hito-tachi wa kowagatte ite, ima ga shuukaku no jikidesu. Karera ga hata o sareba, watashitachiha fuyu no kanshoku-ryoo ga nakunatte shimau kiken ga arimasu. Sokode nani ga okotta no ka shirabete kudasai.
Reply.scriptCondition: (GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount() == 0) and not(IsQuestTaken('Signs_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('Signs_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('Signs_Quest'))

Reply.name: MainSigner_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Dooi shimasu.

Reply.name: MainSigner_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Noomin no mondai ni wa watashi wa kyoomi ga nai to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Kiite imasu yo. Nani ka atta?

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Sore de. Raito, hyooshiki… doko ka de kiita koto ga aru kotobadesu. Sate, tasuku wa kanryoo shimashita. Watashitachi wa korekara meishin ni taisuru senden o okonai, kono genshoo o chuuibukaku kenkyuu suru tsumoridesu. Hoka ni mo dooyoo no genshoo ga hassei shita baai wa, oshirase kudasai.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Nazo no chookoo ga bosutoochinui chikaku no nohara ni araware, sono zen ni hitobito wa sora ni hikari o mita. Watashihitoride wa kore ni taisho dekimasen.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Okane o haratte joohoo o eru kagiri, kotowaru riyuu wa nai to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Ochitsuke, wakamono yo. Naze watashi ni aitakatta no ka oshietekudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000553
Reply.text: Tosukaana-shi no chikaku ni aru Saraebo no mura ni wa, ookina kanban ga teikitekini arawareru nohara ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000554
Reply.text: Totemo yoi. Watashitachi wa soko ni hito o haken shite, kono genshoo o kenkyuu suru tsumoridesu. Kore ga anata no hooshuudesu. Dooyoo no genshoo ga me ni tomatta baai wa oshirase kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000555
Reply.text: Mondainai. Okane o haratte tonde kudasai.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Wakamono, shinpai-soo ni miemasu ne. Nani ka iitai koto ga aru mitaida ne?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001273
Reply.text: Sonotoori. Watashi wa Orakuru shima ni ita nodesuga, nohara ni kimyoona shinboru o mimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001274
Reply.text: Totemo kyoomibukai kansatsudesu ne! Watashi wa genzai, kono mondai ni tsuite kenkyuu o okonatte imasu. Anata wa iimasu, igunotto. Sukoshi tooidesu… Shikashi, kore ni wa ronri ga arimasu. Nante joohoo ga tarinai ndarou! Chinamini, go hoobi wa kochiradesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001275
Reply.text: Hoka no basho de kono yoona mono o mikaketara, kanarazu oshirase shimasu.

Reply.name: Professor_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Wakamono yo, anata wa watashi no shigoto o totemo tasukete kuremashita. Anata kara uketotta zahyoo o shiyoo shite, jikai hoomon suru seikakuna basho o keisan shimashita. Watashi wa totemo koofun shite imasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001277
Reply.text: Tochuu de anata o mamotte hoshiidesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001278
Reply.text: Iya, anata wa nanidesu ka! Jibun de dekiru. Tadashi, soshoo no kekka wa mattaku yosoku dekinai kanoosei ga aru tame, kyoomibukai bunsho o 1-tsu nokoshite hokan shite okitai to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001279
Reply.text: Soreto doo kankei ga aru nodeshou ka? aakaibu ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001280
Reply.text: Sotchoku ni itte, watashi no saikin no kenkyuu wa watashi no hyooban o ikuraka kizutsukemashita… Watashi no dooryoo wa watashi no koto o shinken ni uketomenaku narimashita. Shikashi, anata jishin ga korera no konseki o mita nodesu! Anata wa rikai surudeshou. Soshite soreijoo wa nani mo arimasen. Onegaidakara, kono okane o anata no doryoku e no go hoobi to shite uketotte kudasai. Moo hitsuyoo arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001281
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, shorui o watashite kudasai. Himana toki ni mite mimasu.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Chiikide wa osoroshii dekigoto ga okotte imasu…

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Akuma ga watashitachi no hata o arashite shimatta nodesu. Watashitachi wa karera no tame ni hataraku koto wa dekimasen.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Yoru ni naru to, nohara no ue ni akuma no yoona hikari ga miemashita. Soshite, sakumotsu no man'naka ni imaimashii ato ga arawaremashita.

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Nani ga kowakatta nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Ittai nani ga okotta nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: Sore ga nan'na no ka itte mite mimasu…

Reply.name: Signer_hellodlg0_P1_4
Reply.text: Tashika ni, arushuno akuma no yoona monodesu. Moo koko ni wa ashi o fumiirenai!

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Watashitachi shoojikina kigyooka wa, sekaijuu no saikoo no kakutoo-ka ga kisou ariina o hiraku koto ni shimashita. Subete no junbi wa hobo kanryoo shite ori, nokotte iru no wa, chiiki no daitoshi de matomona kookoku o soshiki suru koto dakedesu. Hatsu no ekishibijonfaito mo iidesu ne. Shuueki-sei no takai bijinesu ni sanka suru chansu ga arimasu. Watashitachi o tasuketekudasai, soo sureba okane o ushinau koto wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Kore wa omoshiroi kamo shiremasen.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Osoraku betsu no kikai ni.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Totemo tasukarimashita. Kore wa anata no go hoobidesu. Saa, koroshiamu o oopun shita riyuu o min'na ni misenakereba narimasen! Soko ni itte kurasu o misete kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000588
Reply.text: Iya, mendokusai!

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg1_P1_1
Reply.text: Sekkaku hikiuketakaraniwa saigomade yaritogemasu.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Nante tatakaidatta ndarou! Itsumo no yoo ni, kore ga anata no hooshuudesu. Kangaeta kekka, anata o paatonaa to shite mukaeru koto ni shimashita. Antei shita shuunyuu ga areba komaru koto wa arimasen. 10000 koin o nyuukin suru dakedesu.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg2_P1_1
Reply.text: Sukoshi kangaete, okane o kazoete miru hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Kyoodoo shoyuu-sha ni naritai baai wa, 10000 koin o kifu shite kudasai.
Reply.scriptCondition: IsQuestTaken('BuyKollizey_Quest') and not(IsQuestComplete('BuyKollizey_Quest')) and not(IsQuestFailed('BuyKollizey_Quest')) and not(IsQuestComplete('r2m2_GiveDisk2ToOrakul'))

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg3_P1_1
Reply.text: Hai, korega okanedesu.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg3_P1_2
Reply.text: Iie, mada okane ga arimasen.

Reply.name: Director_hellodlg4
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, aiboo. Zenkai wa kotobade wa iiarawasenai hodo tasukete itadakimashita. Anata wa watashi no bijinesu o sukutte kuremashita! Hai, doozo. Kore ga shuueki no anata no toribundesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001271
Reply.text: Damasa renakute yokattadesu.

Reply.name: Fermer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Kare ga kono hen no shusshinde wa nai no wa akirakada.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz276
Reply.text: Ben Dorosseru ga hitsuyooda!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz277
Reply.text: Nani o kinisuru no?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz278
Reply.text: Gomen'nasai, anatahadare ni taishite mo totemo shitsureidesu ka, soretomo watashi ga tada era-soo ni shite iru dakedesu ka? Watashi ga dorehodo usuppera ka o minaide kudasai, watashi wa nando mo tatakawanakereba narimasendeshita!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz279
Reply.text: Hatsuen shinaide kudasai. Mawari ni wa abare-sha ga takusan iru… Anata no yuujin wa daredesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz280
Reply.text: Ben Dorosseru, kenkyuusha.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz281
Reply.text: Dakara, anata wa chotto hen'nahitoda to omoimasu. Anata wa majutsu-shi-tachi to tsukiatte imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz282
Reply.text: Majutsu-shi to issho ni?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz283
Reply.text: Furi o shinaide kudasai. Kenkyuusha ga akuryoo to tsurunde ite, akuma ga karera o tasukete iru koto wa daremoga shitte imasu. Dakarakoso karera wa koogai ni teijuu suru nodesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz284
Reply.text: Sore de, doko o mirubeki ka wakarimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz285
Reply.text: Watashitachi no chiikide wa nagaiai kono hito-tachi o mite imasen. Shikashi, majo wa tooku hanareta mura no hitotsu ni hitori de sunde imasu. Moshika shitara kanojo wa anata ni adobaisu o kureru kamo shiremasen. Watashi ni okoranaide kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz286
Reply.text: Daijoobu, kowagaranaide. Watashi wa anata ni akuma o settei shimasen. Kono toki!

Reply.name: Karavanshik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Arigatoo, shin'ainaru hito yo! Watashitachiha kono kamotsu o nagaiai matte imashita. Soodenaito sanzoku ga kanzen ni abaredashi, subete no tsuuro o fuusa shite shimaimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz306
Reply.text: Ochikara ni narete, ureshiidesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz312
Reply.text: Nioroshi o shimashita. Moosukoshi ittara modorimasu. Junbi ga dekitara, kuchibue o fuite kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz314
Reply.text: Moosukoshi mattekudasai, dooro o yasumu hitsuyoo ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz313
Reply.text: Ima sugu ikimashou!

Reply.name: Karavanshik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Moo iku junbi wa dekite imasu ka?

Reply.name: Citizen_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Shita kara hai detekita iwa wa nanidesu ka? Sore wa sugu ni akirakadesu, muchina noomindesu. Kokode wa dare mo anata ni hanashikakeru koto sae shimasen.

Reply.name: Citizen_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Machi no sonzoku o tasukeru hito ga daredeare, watashitachi wa kare o tasukemasu. Nani ga hitsuyoodeshita ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz318
Reply.text: Koko ga Ben Dorosseru ni aeru bashoda to iwa remashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz317
Reply.text: Ben, soo iu no? Watashitachi wa sono yoona hito o shitte imasu. Kare wa chikaku ni jibun de koya o tatete soko ni sunde imasu. Anata no chizu-joo ni sore o maaku sa sete kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz319
Reply.text: Tsuini jibun ga nanimonodearu ka o shirimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz460
Reply.text: Watashi wa josei o sagashiteimasu, kanojo no namae wa Risadesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001287
Reply.text: Risa wa saikin koko ni kite imashitaga, sonogo Poruto ni mukete shuppatsu shimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001288
Reply.text: Sarani kensaku shite mimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz290
Reply.text: Doo shita no?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz297
Reply.text: Doodesu ka? Saigo ni kagami o mita no wa itsudesu ka? Watashitachi no machi wa, kono imawashii sekai ni okeru bunmei no saigo no toridedesu. Soshite, koko ni wa muchina ningen no ibasho wa arimasen, tokuni hakubutsukande wa, tenji-mono o dainashi ni suru koto ni narimasu. Baa ni iki nasai, roodoo-sha.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz298
Reply.text: Bijutsukan wa dare demo tanoshimeru monoda to omotte imashita. Taishuu ni bunka nado o motarashimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz299
Reply.text: Jitsuwa soona ndesu… chooshininotteta ndeshou ne. Kiitekudasai, kootsuukikan o mamoru ni wa anata no yoona yaban hito ga hitsuyoona nodesu. Moshi anata ga sore o buji ni Poruto ni mochikonde kuretara, watashi wa anata no shutsuji ni wa mewotsuburu bakari ka, shichoo mizukara ga akushu surudeshou.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz300
Reply.text: Anata wa koko de jibun-tachi no bunmei ga kanzen ni kurutte shimaimashita. Futsuunohito o tasukeru koto wa dekimasen. Sorede iidesu, anata no yusoo shudan o hitsuyoona basho made todokemasu. Soo sureba, subete no shitsumon ni kotaeru koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz301
Reply.text: Machigainaku! Kanrinin no tokoro ni iki, kare kara shiji o ukemasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz302
Reply.text: Dono yoona maneejaa ga iru no ka mite mimashou.

Reply.name: Ben_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Iwan, kaettekita no! ? Gomen'nasai, wakamono, ii machigaemashita. Me wa moo onajide wa arimasen… Nani ga anata o watashi ni tsurete kita nodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz322
Reply.text: Watashi no mura wa yaka remashita. Chichi wa nakunaru mae ni, watashi ga yooshideari, anata o sagasu yoo ni iimashita. Korera wa watashi no hontoo no chichi no monodesu. Soshite ima, watashi wa anata no mae ni tatte iru nodesuga, tsugini nani o sureba ii no ka wakarimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz324
Reply.text: Nanite kotoda! Hontooni mitsukatta nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz325
Reply.text: Dare ga mitsukatta no?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz326
Reply.text: Dore dake nite iru ka mite kudasai. Watashi ga jibun jishin o itsuwatta no mo fushigide wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz327
Reply.text: Gensoku suru! Kichinto setsumei shite kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz328
Reply.text: Totemo isoide iru no o yurushitekudasai. So no yoona koto ga okorimasu. Kiitekudasai, anata no otoosan, hontoo no otoosan wa, tsumari, subarashii hitona nodesu! Kare no namae wa Iwan Guodesu. Kare wa sekaijuu o tabi shite, atarashii tochi ya tekunorojii o hakken shimashita. Kako, kangaete mireba, 30-nen ni wataru jinrui no hatten no michisuji zentai o hobo jizen ni kettei shita no wa karedeshita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz329
Reply.text: Tsumari, chokusetsu meiji rareta nodesu…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz330
Reply.text: Hai! Sonotoori! Kare no hakken wa hitobito ga tachinaoru no o tasukemashita. Anata ga mite iru sekai ga kono yoo ni natta no wa tsui saikin no kotodesu. Tsui saikin made, watashitachiha denki mo tsuushin mo naku, kurayaminonakade chiisanaka ni atsumatte imashita. Daremoga, kono sekai ni wa kare igai ni daremoinai to kakushin shite imashita. Rajio o hitobito ni shookai shita no wa anata no chichioyada to iu koto o gozonjidesuka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz331
Reply.text: Jitsuwa, sono shunkan made watashi wa chichi no koto o nani mo shirimasendeshita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz332
Reply.text: Sate, kare ga dorehodo idaina jinbutsudeatta ka ga wakarimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz333
Reply.text: Kare ni nani ga okotta nodesu ka? Kare wa shinda?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz334
Reply.text: Mondai no jijitsu wa dare mo shirimasen. Aru jiten de, kare wa tan'ni sugata o keshimashita. Kare wa yoku shira rete ori, dare mo kare ni te o ageyou to shinakatta to iu jijitsu nimokakawarazu. Sorenikuwaete, Iwan o tatakai de taosu no wa hijoo ni kon'nandeshita. Kare wa jibun no kuruma kara kiseki o okoshimashita!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz335
Reply.text: To iu koto wa, chichioya wa mada ikite iru kanoosei ga aru nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz336
Reply.text: Totemo jikan ga tachimashita. Muda ni kitai o daku hitsuyoo wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz337
Reply.text: Demo otoosan ga ichibandattatte itteru yo! Kare wa kiken'na tabi ga matte iru koto o shitte ite, watashi ga kare o mitsukete sukueru yoo ni ato o nokoshimashita. Kore wa nazo no tegamidesu. Soshite kimyoona enban ga watashi o gooru made michibiite kureru!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz338
Reply.text: Seishun… katsute watashi mo soodatta. Soodesu, kiboo o ushinawanai yoo ni shimashou. Watashi wa ryokoo suru ni wa toshi o tori sugite imasuga, anatanara nani demo dekiru yoodesu ne.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz339
Reply.text: Doko kara kensaku o hajimereba yoideshou ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz340
Reply.text: Anata no disuku wa kantande wa arimasen. Hon no yoona monodesu. Tashika ni, yomu no wa muzukashiideshou. Anata no otoosan ga kono-pon o kakitometa to iu koto wa, sore o yomu tame no debaisu ga ie ni nakereba naranai to iu koto ni narimasu. Kare no himitsu no kakurega wa pesuto o koeta hokutoo no doko ka ni atta yooda. Watashi ga hon o asatte iru ma, soko ni itte kudasai. Moshika shitara nanika-betsu no koto o omoitsuku kamo shiremasen. Kooun o.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz341
Reply.text: Sugu ni shuppatsu shimasu! Tasuketekurete arigatoo.

Reply.name: Ben_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, wakamono

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000621
Reply.text: Ben Dorosserudesu ka? Mondai wa, watashi ga sagashite iru mono ga 1-tsu aru to iu kotodesu. Osoraku katamen ni "I","G","2" no kigoo ga egaka reta purasuchikku-sei no disuku.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000620
Reply.text: Kangae sasete kudasai, choodo kinoo, aru otoko ga watashi no tokoro ni kite, anata no setsumei ni pittari no disuku o koonyuu shitai to mooshidemashita. Watashi wa, Middogarudo ni kare no shoohin no kaite ga iru kamo shirenai to iimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000622
Reply.text: Sore wa nanto warui kotodeshou. Sate, mite mimashou.

Reply.name: Ben_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Roojin o wasurenaide kudasai. Mata o ai dekite totemo tanoshiidesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000653
Reply.text: Iwan Guo wa ryokoo-chuu ni soratobu-sen ni sooguu shita kanoosei wa arudeshou ka? Kare wa kore ni tsuite anata ni nani mo iimasendeshita ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000654
Reply.text: Maa, soodeshita. Ima omoidashimasuga, watashitachiha suwatte monogatari o katatte imashitaga, kare wa sora no hikari ya kagayaku enban, sonohoka no itan ni tsuite hanashi hajimemashita. Seru no machi no chikaku de jiken ga hassei shita. Soshite watashi wa kare ni iimasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000655
Reply.text: Seru. Kono basho o oboete imasu! Ohanashi arigatoogozaimasu, mata kondo kiite mimasu! Isoganakereba narimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001282
Reply.text: Shikashi, kore wa hijoo ni juuyoodesu! Anata ga sara ni tsuite tazuneta toki, watashi wa totsuzen, aru densetsu o omoidashimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001283
Reply.text: Ryokoo-chuu ni watashi ga minakatta mono wa nanidesu ka? Watashiniha hontooni juuyoo katsu kinkyuu no shigoto ga matte imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001284
Reply.text: Kore wa totemo furui hanashidesu. Sarani, sono koko no bubun wa genson shite imasen. Soshite, sono kurutta sakusha ga nani o kaita ka o rikai dekiru no wa anata dakeda to watashi wa kanjite imasu. Korera no memo o totte kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001285
Reply.text: Wakarimashita, himana toki ni yonde mimashou.

Reply.name: PortoCitizen0
Reply.text: Go renraku itadakereba teinei ni ohanashi o ukagaimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz462
Reply.text: Watashi wa josei o sagashiteimasu, kanojo no namae wa Risadesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001289
Reply.text: Risa wa nagaiai koko ni kite imasen. Osoraku nanika ga kanojo o tochuu de tometa nodeshou ka? Sanzoku ga dooro de abare mawatte imasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_001290
Reply.text: Ima sugu kakunin shite mimashou.

Reply.name: Zavhoz_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Anata wa borantiadesu ka? Chotto usupperaidesuga… unten to shageki no shikata o shitte oite hoshii to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz292
Reply.text: Daijoobudesu, shinpaishinaide kudasai. Doko ni iku no ka oshietekudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz307
Reply.text: Soredewa, anata no chizu-joo ni anata no mokutekichi to sanzoku ni yoru koogeki no kanoosei no aru basho o maaku sa sete kudasai. Koko ga botorunekkudesu. Watashitachi wa tokuni keikai shinakereba narimasen. Toransupooto wa jidoo de unten shimasu. Anata no shigoto wa, kamotsu no idoo oyobi haitatsu-chuu no anzen o kakuho suru kotodesu. Kuria?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz308
Reply.text: Hijoo ni. Itsu kooen shimasu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz309
Reply.text: Junbi ga dekite ireba, ima kara demo. Hitsuyoona kiki o koonyuu shite setchi suru koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz311
Reply.text: Mada yari nokoshita koto ga ikutsu ka nokotte imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz310
Reply.text: Ima sugu hikkoshi dekimasu.

Reply.name: Zavhoz_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Shuppatsu suru junbi wa dekimashita ka?

Reply.name: Staruha_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Tanin no rei no nioi ga suru!!!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz288
Reply.text: Anata wa majodesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz293
Reply.text: Anata wa muchidesu, otogibanashi o juubun ni kiite imasu!!!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz294
Reply.text: Gomen'nasai, o baachan, ijiwaru o shite iru wakede wa arimasen. Watashi wa Ben Doro…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_xyz295
Reply.text: Ima dewa o baachan ni mo narimashita! Naze watashi wa anata to hanashite iru nodesu ka? Kare wa Ben o sagashiteimasu. Akutoo no koto wa shirimasenshi, shiritaku mo arimasen! Maa, demo.-Kyoo no shita ni dore dake no mizu ga nagarekonda koto ka… saigo ni kare ni atta no wa Middogarudodatta. Atchi mite. Hakubutsukan de.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_xyz296
Reply.text: Doomo arigatoo.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000590
Reply.text: Kono zumen ni shitagatte kuruma o henkoo suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000596
Reply.text: Wakarimasu… Hai… Sore de… Genri-teki ni wa, subete ga watashiniha akirakadesu. Shikashi, nani mo umaku ikimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000597
Reply.text: Dooshite korena no?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000598
Reply.text: Shigoto o suru ni wa, tokubetsuna koogu o koonyuu suru tame ni tagaku no okane ga hitsuyoodesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000599
Reply.text: Mondai janai. Watashi wa kanari no yuufukuna hitodesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000600
Reply.text: Sarani, hijoo ni mezurashii zairyoodearu fukugoo gookin ga hitsuyoo ni narimasu. Soshite kare no baai, subete ga haruka ni fukuzatsu ni narimasu. Kizon no jookende wa seisan dekimasen. Kansei-hin o tokasu koto wa dekimasuga.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000601
Reply.text: Kono shiryoo wa doko de mitsukarimasu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000602
Reply.text: Hotondo no baai, aatifakuto, kodai no kikai no buhin ni fukuma remasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000603
Reply.text: Tsumari, doko ka de antiikuyunitto o mitsukenakereba narimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000604
Reply.text: Hai, sono sozai wa tokuchoo-tekina aomigakatta iroai de ninshiki sa remasu. Sate, koroshiamude wa faitaa-tachi ga samazamana mezurashii mono ni kakemasu. Wasurenaide kudasai. Zairyoo ni kuwaete, okane mo hitsuyoodesu. 10 man koin areba juubunda to omoimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000605
Reply.text: Arigatoo, doko o mirubeki ka rikai shimashita.

Reply.name: Umelec_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Soredemo kuruma o kaetainara, fukugoo gookin to 10 man koin o kure.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000613
Reply.text: Hai, wa i, sore wa shitte imasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000612
Reply.text: Kore ga anata no okane to ikadadesu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000614
Reply.text: Oo! Koko ni wa suudai no kuruma ga tomeru no ni juubun'na supeesu ga arimasu. Osoraku, zairyoo o subete watashi ni makasete kuretara, 90000 de hatarakimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000616
Reply.text: Suu-jikan inai ni subete no junbi ga totonoimasu. Koko de mattete.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000618
Reply.text: Shuushoku suru!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000619
Reply.text: Sabaku ni nani ga kakusa rete iru ka ga tsuini wakarimashita! Fowaado!

Reply.name: Fighter1_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Sate, shujinkoo? ! Tatakatte kachitaidesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000606
Reply.text: Hooshuu ni shika kyoomi ga nai. Sate, fukugoo gookin ga areba…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000610
Reply.text: Kangae sasete kudasai… Hai, sore wa watashi no senaka ni arimasu! Kateba moraeru! Shikashi, tatakai wa shitoo ni narudarou! Shoosha wa haisha no kuruma ni nokosa reta mono o subete ubaimasu! Dooi suru?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000611
Reply.text: Junbi dekimashita!

Reply.name: Fighter2_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Nandeshou? Ariina de watashi to tatakaitaidesu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000607
Reply.text: Hai, ki ni shimasen, katsu koto dake ni kyoomigaarimasu. Fukugoo gookin wa arimasu ka? Kare no tame ni tatakau junbi wa dekite imasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000608
Reply.text: Hooshuu dake ni kyoomigaarunara, anata wa hontoo no senshide wa arimasen. Asoko ni iru tatakau josei ni kiite mite kudasai, kanojo wa takusan no tatakai ni katta nodesu… Osoraku kanojo wa sooshite irudeshou.

Reply.name: Zavhoz_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Anata wa nani ga hitsuyoodesu ka? Jitsuwa isogashii ndesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000636
Reply.text: Kimyoona enban-joo no buttai o uritai hito ga anata no tokoro ni kita koto ga arimasu ka?

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000637
Reply.text: Hai, kimashita. Shikashi, kare wa koko de kaite ga mitsukarazu, kita e mukaimashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000638
Reply.text: Kitade wa? Soshite mura wa dondon toozakatte ikimasu… joohoo arigatoogozaimasu.

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Shoonen, sha o motte imasu ka?

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Kanpeki! Watashitachiha chiiki no chitsujo o kaifuku suru tame ni koko ni imasu. Sonotame, toozoku no kichi o koogeki suru tame ni kyooryokuna kuruma o motta hisshi no hitobito ga hitsuyoodesu! Watashitachi to isshodesu ka? Anata ga dooi surunara, chikoku shinaide kudasai…

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Soo, watashi wa kono dooro de mottomo osoroshii kuruma o motte iru nodesu!

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Mochiron, watashi mo isshodesu… Mazuwa kono gyangu kara hajimete, sorekara hoka no gyangu to taisen shimashou.

Reply.name: CS_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Iya, konomama demo juubun mondai wa aru yo.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0
Reply.text: O wakai kata, anata ni wa eikyoo-ryoku no aru yuujin ga irassharu yoodesu ne. Sukoshi onegai o shite kuremasen ka?
Reply.scriptCondition: not(IsQuestTaken( 'WorkGiver_Quest1' )) and (GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount() == 0) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'TalkWithFather_Quest' )) and QuestStatus('Buyer_Quest1')==Q_COMPLETED

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Shigoto de koko ni ita toki ni, guuzen anata no yuujin no Serugo o mitsukemashita. Watashi wa kare to, soogo ni yuuekina kyooryoku ni tsunagaru juuyoona kaiwa o shite imasu. Shikashi, zan'nen'nagara hitsuyoona shorui ga temoto ni arimasen….

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Serugo ga mada kita ni iku mae ni gasorinsutando ni tsureteitte kudasai. Hitsuyoona shorui o junbi shite, hitori de koko ni modoru koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Mite mimashou, ittai nani ga mondaina nodeshou ka?

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Hitsuyoona koto o iu dake de…

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Suwatte, michi o oshietekudasai…

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: Iie, too sugimasu. Karera wa ie de watashi o matteimasu.

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Anata wa watashinojinsei saidai no torihiki o dainashi ni shimashita! Aitakunai yo!

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg1_P1
Reply.text: Ochitsuite, ochitsuite…

Reply.name: WorkGiver_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Motto hayakude kita kamo shiremasen… Mada subete no shorui o mitsukete junbi suru hitsuyoo ga arimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000558
Reply.text: Okane o haratte kuruma kara orite kudasai!

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000559
Reply.text: Modottara, motto hayaku betsu no doraibaa ga mitsukarudeshou.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000557
Reply.text: Kinoo wa genkan de, kyoo wa koko, watashi no kuruma no naka de! Kare o mitekudasai, kare wa amarini mo osoi no ga sukide wa arimasen! Watashi no kuruma de ryokoo suru ni wa junbi ga hitsuyoodesu! Soshite ippantekini, watashi wa anata no pinku no jaketto to anata no…

Reply.name: Medik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Otokonoko! Anata wa ryokoo-shadesu ka? Kotaenakute mo daijoobudesu, watashi ga mite mimashou… Hai byooin no basho o oshiete itadakemasu ka? Moo shitte imasu… Kitto soko ni wa kyoomibukai mono ga takusan mitsukarudeshou. Son'na mono wa iranaishi, kono eria ni wa sanzoku mo irushi… demo, kimi wa kiken'na yatsuda! 25 koin de basho o go an'nai shimasu.
Reply.scriptCondition: (GetCurNpc():GetSpokenCount() == 0) and not(IsQuestItemPresent( 'quest_medicine_box' )) and not(IsQuestComplete( 'r1m1_Botanik_Quest' )) and not(IsQuestFailed( 'r1m1_Botanik_Quest' ))

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000562
Reply.text: Son'na nansensu ni kin wanai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000561
Reply.text: Omoshiroidesu ne, koko ni okane ga arimasu!

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Watashi wa roohei de, takusan no mono o mitekimashita. Min'na watashi o kowagatte imashita, watashi wa kuuruna kuruma to takusan no juu o motte imashita. Soshite ima, watashi no ashi wa mattaku aruku koto ga dekizu, okane no tame ni monogatari o katatte imasu… Soodesune, 10 koin o kurereba, ikikata o oshiemasu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000564
Reply.text: Yatte miyou…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000578
Reply.text: Kimi, sha no tanku no gasorin no ryoo ni wa tsuneni ki o tsukete ne, doo no man'naka de gasorin ga nakunattara taihenda yo. Subete!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000579
Reply.text: Zurui otoko, anata ga inakute mo watashi wa kore o shitte imashita…

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Nanda, jinsei no adobaisu o mata kikitai no ka? ! Jaa, koin o 15-mai kudasai…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000566
Reply.text: Nani? 15?! Shikashi, watashi mo dooi shimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000580
Reply.text: Oboete oite kudasai, shoonen! Sentoo-chuu, miseinen no toozoku-tachi ni kakoma reta toki, juuyoona koto wa tachidomaranai kotodesu… Kaiten shite subete no juu de uchimashou! Soo sureba, karera wa anata o naguri nikuku narimasu… Karera ga doo iu wake ka watashi o kakonda koto o oboete imasu… Shikashi, kono hanashi wa yuuryoodesu…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000581
Reply.text: Omoshiroi…

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Matamata… nante kookishin ooseina ndeshou. Koko de koin o 20-mai kudasai. Soodenaito nomimono ga tarimasen…

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000575
Reply.text: Kyoomi naidesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000568
Reply.text: Shoyuu…

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000582
Reply.text: Anata wa jibun o eesu de kuuruna doraibaada to omotte imasuga, anata ni wa watashi no ashinoshooshi ni sae kachi ga nai to itte okimasu. Tsuneni hayaku unten shitai baai wa, dooro o unten shite kudasai. Watashitachi no chiikide wa sorehodo dooro ga sugurete inai koto wa rikai shite imasuga, dooro ni koshuu shite ite wa dare mo oitsukimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000583
Reply.text: Kyoomibukai shitendesu.

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg3
Reply.text: Anata wa roo senshi no monogatari ga sukina yoodesu ne. Soshite poketto no naka de kozeni ga naru oto ga sukidesu. Koko de 25 koin kudasai!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000576
Reply.text: Okane no mudadzukai ni wa unzaridesu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000570
Reply.text: Hijoo ni kyoomibukaidesu ne, koko ni okane ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000584
Reply.text: Kiite, booya. Kono chiiki no nooka wa mina, kazoekata o mattaku shirimasen. Anata ga orokamonodenakereba, kore o riyoo suru koto ga dekimasu. Samazamana mura no shoohin no kakaku-sa o riyoo shite, takusan no okane o kasegu koto ga dekimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000585
Reply.text: Arigatoo, yoi adobaisu.

Reply.name: Oldsolder_hellodlg4
Reply.text: Kuso, naze watashi o segamu nodesu ka? Moo jitensha ga nakunatte shimatta. Yoshi, 30 goorudo o watashite roojin no hanashi o kiite kure.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000577
Reply.text: Iie, anata no adobaisu wa hanatte oite kudasai.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000572
Reply.text: Koko ni 30 goorudo ga arimasu.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000586
Reply.text: Booya, bakadane! Kashikoi hitonara, ano kami ni misute rareta baa de baka roojin to hanashi tari shite jikan o muda ni sezu, gai ni dete okane o kasegu ka, sekai o tanken surudeshou. Moshi watashi ga kami o motte itara, anata ni `mottomo taidana tanken-kaoyobi ryokoo-sha no sotsugyoo shoosho' o kakimasu. Soredemo jibun ga kuurudearu koto o shoomei shitai baai wa, kono bun'ya no shokubutsu gakusha o sagashite mite kudasai. Moshika shitara, anata no tame ni jikan o muda ni shite inakatta no kamo shiremasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000587
Reply.text: Jinsei ni tsuite takusan no koto o manabimashita.

Reply.name: Botanik_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, mishiranu hito. Watashi wa koko ni suwatte utsukushii shokubutsu o sodateyou to shite imasu. Watashi wa jikken ni yakudatsu nanika kachi no aru mono o sagashite arukimawaru koto ga yoku arimasuga, mitsuke rareru no wa yaketa kuruma no nochi ni nokoru buki dakedesu. Sate, moshi anata ga sono chiiki de furui byooin o mitsukete, soko kara kusuri no haitta hako o motte kitanara, watashi wa anata ni korera no juu o sashiagemasu. Sorera wa watashi ni totte nani no yaku ni mo tachimasen, watashi wa booryoku ga sukide wa arimasen.

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000592
Reply.text: Yoshi, zenbu sagashite mimasu!

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000589
Reply.text: Ushironi-yaku ga haittemasu.
Reply.scriptResult: TakeQuest('r1m1_Botanik_Quest'); CompleteQuest('r1m1_Botanik_Quest'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_medicine_box'); AddPlayerItemsWithBox( 'hornet01', 2, 0, CVector(2141, 361, 2742)); AddPlayerItemsWithBox( 'specter01', 1, 0, CVector(2141, 361, 2742)); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Dlg_pl_000594
Reply.text: Watashi wa kore ni taisho shitakunai.

Reply.name: Botanik_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Watashi ga tanonda mono wa motte kite kuremashita ka?

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Dare ga iru nda? Bijinesu?

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: So, bokuda! Kun wa pita no musukodane. Sanzoku ga abarete kikenna jidaida. Karojite Yuzuni ni tadoritsuitaga, keibihei o 2 nin koroshiteshimatta. Kore ga saigo no tabi ni narudaro.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Kibinna wakamonoda. Mitemiyo, itsumonagara i monoda. Kore ga haitatsu no hoshuda.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Konnichiha, Sergo sandesu ka? Guruhoi mura kara kono nimotsu o mottekimashita.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Hajimete no furaitona nda. Nimotsu wa do suruno?

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Arigato, jitsuha nani mo kitai shiteinakatta nda.
Reply.scriptResult: SetRadarUpgrade(1); TActivate('DestroyGloohoe'); TActivate('RETURN_TO_FATHER'); RemoveQuestItem('quest_potato'); CompleteQuest( 'Buyer_Quest1' ); TakeQuest('TalkWithFather_Quest'); AddBook('r1_book_the_mask'); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Tasukattayo. Otosan ni yoroshiku.

Reply.name: Buyer_hellodlg1_P1
Reply.text: Kanarazu tsutaeruyo.

Reply.name: Father_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Omae wa mo otonada. Musukoyo, tadashi koto o suru nda.

Reply.name: Father_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Shitsubo wa sasenai.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_001245
Reply.text: Kitai shiteiruyo.

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Nanika otetsudai dekiru koto wa arimasu ka?

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Mochiron uketotte kudasai. Subete ga subarashii jootaidesu.

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Yuujinii no baatendaa ga watashi ni kare no shoyuu-mono o tori ni kite kuremashita.

Reply.name: Dlg_npc_000593
Reply.text: Anata no torakku ni wa supeesu ga arimasen.

Reply.name: HaveBigBoom_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Arigatoo. Kore de kari ni ikeru zo!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Guruhoi shusshindesu ka?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Watashitachi wa sore o kiki, kyookan shimashita. Monogoto wa okorimasu. Ie made tetsudatte kudasai.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Iie, kokode wa dare mo anata o tasukete kuremasen. Korera wa kami ni misute rareta bashodesu. Bosutoochinui de un tameshi o shite mimasen ka. Kooeki-ji ga soko ni atsumatte iru yoonanode, nanika wakaru kamo shiremasen.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Guruhoi ga osowa reta. Zen'in ga shiboo shita. watashi no chichi…

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Kekkoodesu. Koko o shuppatsu shimasu. Ben Dorosseru ya kenkyuusha ni tsuite nani ka kiita hito wa imasu ka?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: Wakare! Watashi wa jibun no unmei o sagashi ni iku tsumoridesu.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1
Reply.text: Doo shita no? Anata ni wa kao ga arimasen.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_1
Reply.text: Saiaku! Kono yoona koto wa nan-nen mo no ma, watashitachi ni okotta koto wa arimasendeshita. Shikashi, Yuujinii o kuruma de tsuuka suru hito wa dare mo imasendeshita.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_2
Reply.text: Koofun shinaide kudasai. Mura o yakiharatte kemuri no yoo ni kieru hodo no chikara ga arunara, son'na teki ni te o dasubekideshou ka?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_3
Reply.text: Watashi wa hontooni hantai shite iru nodeshou ka? Dekireba yaroo-domo o tsubuse! Shikashi, dare mo mita koto ga nai satsujin-han o doo yatte mitsuke rarerudeshou ka?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_4
Reply.text: Ferikusu wa kiken'na otokoda… son'na koto wa ki ni shite inai no wa wakaruga. Kare wa chiisana sanzoku no mura matawa kyoten o shiki-ka ni oite imasu.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_5
Reply.text: Jitsuwa kare to wa fukashin kyootei no yoona mono o musunde iru. Kare wa dare mo koroshimasenshi, watashitachi wa kare o haijo suru tame ni yoohei o yobimasen.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_6
Reply.text: Shikashi ima, anata wa yoosai-ka sa reta kichi o koogeki shitai to kangaete imasu. Watashi ga anata o omoitodomara sete iru to wa omowanaide kudasai! Watakushijishin, nagaiai kono kiseichuu o kujo shitai to kangaete imashitaga, sono riyuu wa tsugi no tooridesu. Yori kyooryokuna buki ga hitsuyoo ni naru no wa anata dakedesu. Zaimuka ni nanika o kakushite iru. Soko ni itte, watashi karada to itte kudasai.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1
Reply.text: Karera wa chookaku shoogaimono o yaki-goroshi, zen'in ga shinda! Otoosan, juunin no minasan…

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_1
Reply.text: Sorede karera wa mukoo kara kita nodesu! Karera o mitsukete fukushuu shinakereba narimasen!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_2
Reply.text: Nani o iu ka kangaete kudasai! Kore wa watashi no chichidesu! Soshite nan juu-ri mo no tsumi no nai hitobito! Satsujin-sha wa don'na gisei o haratte demo batsu o ukemasu!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_3
Reply.text: Ferikkusu ga kore ni kankei shite iru node wanai ka to utagatte imasu. Doko de mitsuke rareru ka wakaranaidesu ka?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_4
Reply.text: Sorenara machigainaku karedesu! Watashi wa nakama o atsumete…

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_5
Reply.text: Guruhoi no hakai wa subete no kyootei o mukoonisuru! Kare o koroshimasu! Watashi wa sudeni senjoo de kare ni ai, shoori shimashita.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg1_P1_6
Reply.text: Doomo arigatoo!

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2
Reply.text: Sate, chooshi wa doodesu ka?

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2_1
Reply.text: Fukaku kansha mooshiagemasu. Kore o mite kudasai. Watashi wa saishin no gyangu zei o shiharau tame ni kono okane o atsumeta tokorodesu. Kansha no shirushi to shite, sorera o anata ni sashiagemasu. Watashi no buki mo azukatte moraemasu yo. Nagakute kiken'na tabi no kooun o inorimasu.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2_P1
Reply.text: Ferikkusu wa moo jama shinai yo. Watashi wa kare o okuridashimashita.

Reply.name: HurdTrucker_hellodlg2_P1_1
Reply.text: Sayoonara, zen'nin yo. Modoru ka doo ka wa wakarimasenga, furusato no koto wa tsuneni oboete imasu.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0
Reply.text: Kon'nichiwa, wakamono. Chotto jikan aru?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_1
Reply.text: Anata wa kuuruna doraibaadesu ne. Osoraku kono chiiki no achikochi o tabi shita koto ga aru node wanaideshou ka? Nimotsu o hakobu no o tetsudatte hoshii nodesuga, chiiki ga yoku wakarimasen. Issho ni shuuhen no mura e ikimasen ka?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_2
Reply.text: Sore de, chigai wa nanidesu ka? Kantan'na kotodashi, chanto shiharaimasu yo.

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_3
Reply.text: Naze son'nani muzukashiku kangaeru nodesu ka? Dooi suru?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_4
Reply.text: Nan to iu seijitsu-sadeshou! Wakarimashita, warugi wa arimasen. Mata baka o mitsukemasu. Sayonara!

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1
Reply.text: Watashi ni hanashite imasu ka?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_1
Reply.text: Kamotsu to wa gutaitekini nandesuka?

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_2
Reply.text: [Atama no naka] Koko de nanika ayashii yoodesu. Kyaria no shoki ni toozoku to kakawatta hoo ga iidesu ka? Zettai ni haijo dekimasen!

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_3
Reply.text: Naze damedesu ka?
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('LISAACTIVE'); TakeQuest('d_Lisa_Quest'); AddHistory( 'r1_Yes_Lisa_History_01' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); EndConversation()

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_4
Reply.text: Keiiwoarawashite, okotowari sezaru o emasen. Toozoku to wa kankeinai!

Reply.name: Lisa_hellodlg0_P1_5
Reply.text: Watashi mo ikou ka na.
Reply.scriptResult: GetCurNpc():SetSpokenCount( 1 ); TActivate('LISAREMOVE'); TActivate('ZASADA_4'); AddHistory( 'r1_No_Lisa_History_02' ); AddFadingMsgId( 'fm_history_got' ); EndConversation()
